T02D1203:240a-27: 'khor gyi 'du 'dzi mang bas mi dben no //
T02D1203:240a-29: sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo yin la /
T02D1203:240a-31: 'khor la sogs pa dang ldan pas brgyan cing mdzes par byas ba'i don yin pa'o //
T02D1203:240a-32: rdo rje mda' ni rnam par gzugs //
T02D1203:240a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:240a-34: de ru mchod sbyin don du ni //
T02D1203:240a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dang gtor ma'i rim pa bya'o //
T02D1203:240a-36: byol song rab kyi gzugs ni glang //
T02D1203:240a-38: rig pa med pa'i phyir na byol song rab shi ba'i ro dang mtshungs so //
T02D1203:240a-39: de yang bdag dang bral ba'i phyir ro ste /
T02D1203:240a-40: rnal 'byor pa yis kyang chos bdag dang bdag gi 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir blang bar bya'o ;
T02D1203:240a-41: / gri gug rung bas brtag par bya //
T02D1203:240a-43: nyon mongs pa rnams gcod pa'i bdag nyid ni /
T02D1203:240a-44: shes rab kyis de rnams brtag par bya'o //
T02D1203:240a-45: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1203:240b-0: yan lag rang ni mgo bo'i thod pa @240b yin no ;
T02D1203:240b-1: / padma'i snod ces bya ba ni thod pa yang yin la padma yang yin te /
T02D1203:240b-3: snod kyang yin te bdud rtsi'i snod do //
T02D1203:240b-4: sgron ma lnga ni glang po che'i stobs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:240b-5: bsres pa ni mnam par sbyar bas bsres pa'o //
T02D1203:240b-6: gang dang sbyar ba zhe na /
T02D1203:240b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang ldan //
T02D1203:240b-10: mi bskyod pa ni gla rtsi'o //
T02D1203:240b-11: rnam par snang mdzad ni bzhi mnyam mo //
T02D1203:240b-12: rin chen 'byung ldan ni si la'o //
T02D1203:240b-13: 'od dpag med ni ga bur ro //
T02D1203:240b-14: don yod grub pa ni stobs chen po'o //
T02D1203:240b-15: ldan pa ni bsres nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir ro mnyam par byas pa'o //
T02D1203:240b-16: de ru dam tshig dag pa ni //
T02D1203:240b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:240b-18: tshigs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas skabs de ru dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
T02D1203:240b-19: nyes pa'i skyon rnams mi 'byung ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02D1203:240b-20: rtag tu ni gnas skabs thams cad du rgyun chad pa med pa dus gsum du'o //
T02D1203:240b-21: bdag rang ni shi yis dogs pa dang /
T02D1203:240b-23: lhung gis dogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1203:240b-24: bzhin du bsrung zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D1203:240b-25: rnal 'byor pho mo rnams la sogs pa la ;
T02D1203:240b-26: srog dang bral gyis dogs pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa bzhin du bsrung ba'o //
T02D1203:240b-27: dam tshig bsrungs pas ci zhig dgos snyam pa la /
T02D1203:240b-29: dam tshig bsrungs na grub pa ni //
T02D1203:240b-30: lha yi dbang phyug rnyed pa'o //
T02D1203:240b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang phyug la bos nas yon tan gsungs pa ste /
T02D1203:240b-34: de yang thun mong gi dngos grub dang /
T02D1203:240b-35: mchog gi dngos grub rnyed par byed pa'i rgyu dam tshig yin gyi /
T02D1203:240b-36: gzhan du na skye ba'i 'dir yang mi bde ba sna tshogs la 'byung la /
T02D1203:240b-37: shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sogs par skye'o //
T02D1203:240b-38: de skad du rgyud la sogs pa kun nas kyang gsungs so //
T02D1203:240b-39: de bzhin du 'dir dgongs pa'i thig le'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1203:240b-40: dam tshig nyams pa'i sems can ni //
T02D1203:241a-0: rgyal po blun po rkun ma @241a * //
T02D1203:241a-2: / gcan gzan gza' dang sa bdag rims //
T02D1203:241a-3: me chu dug dang mkha' 'gro bdun //
T02D1203:241a-4: yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs dang //
T02D1203:241a-5: dus min shi nas mnar med 'gro //
T02D1203:241a-7: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad de /
T02D1203:241a-8: dam tshig mchog gi ye shes te ;
T02D1203:241a-9: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:241a-10: bza' ba'i dam tshig kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1203:241a-12: ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1203:241a-13: dang pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1203:241a-15: zas la ji srid spyod pa de srid du bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1203:241a-16: stobs lnga dang ldan par byas la bza' ba'o //
T02D1203:241a-17: de dag ni rigs lnga'i dam tshig go //
T02D1203:241a-18: de nas 'khor lo'i mchod pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1203:241a-19: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas ni //
T02D1203:241a-21: bsrung ba la sogs pas mnyes par byas nas ;
T02D1203:241a-22: de ma thag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa'o //
T02D1203:241a-24: 'khor lo dang bcas rigs rab ces bya'o //
T02D1203:241a-25: de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni //
T02D1203:241a-26: rab tshim byas nas gtor ma dbul //
T02D1203:241a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:241a-28: gtor ma ni bdud rtsi la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma'o //
T02D1203:241a-29: de'i gnas la sogs pa ni nam phyed ni gtang ba'i dus so //
T02D1203:241a-30: mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyun srang gi lam bzhi mdo'am /
T02D1203:241a-31: yang na lam sum mdo gyes pa de ru gtor ma bskyal bar bya ba'o //
T02D1203:241a-32: gnas tshogs kyi 'khor lo gtor ma chen po dang
T02D1203:241a-33: bcas pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba 'di yin te
T02D1203:241a-34: / dur khrod dam ni chu ngogs su //
T02D1203:241a-36: gzhan du na de ru ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor ro //
T02D1203:241a-37: dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
T02D1203:241a-38: chad pa la sogs pa'i rtogs pa bsrung ba dag pa ni /
T02D1203:241a-40: rtag tu ni dus rtag tu bsgoms pa'i stobs bskyed par bya /
T02D1203:241a-41: bdag rang ni srog dang bral gyi dgos pa la sogs pa bzhin bsrung ba ni /
T02D1203:241a-42: de gnyis su med pa'i don la 'bad pa ste chad pa'i dga' ba bsrung ba'o //
T02D1203:241a-44: dam tshig ni mchog gi dga' ba /
T02D1203:241b-0: bsrung ba ni @241b chad pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1203:241b-1: 'grub pa ni rang bzhin dga' ba /
T02D1203:241b-2: rnyed pa ni rang bzhin dga' mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1203:241b-3: da ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bshad par bya'o //
T02D1203:241b-4: dam tshig ni bza' ba ste chad pa'i dga' bar /
T02D1203:241b-5: de bzhin du mchog ni mchog gi dga' bar /
T02D1203:241b-6: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' bar /
T02D1203:241b-7: dad pa ni 'dod pa'i dad pa la sogs pa /
T02D1203:241b-8: rtag tu bza' ba ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don
T02D1203:241b-9: rgyun du bza' zhing nyams su myong bar bya zhes
T02D1203:241b-11: dgyes pa'i dam tshig zin nas su //
T02D1203:241b-15: skye mched la sogs pa yang dgyes shing tshim pas dga' ba'o //
T02D1203:241b-16: 'khor lo ni bde ba chen po la sogs pa /
T02D1203:241b-17: bcas pa ni rtsa gzhan rnams dang bcas pa /
T02D1203:241b-18: rigs ni rigs dang rigs can ma'i rtsa kun /
T02D1203:241b-20: khyad par du yang de dag gis dgyes pa'i don to //
T02D1203:241b-21: gtor ma ni bar chad kyi bgegs bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02D1203:241b-23: nam phyed ni mchog gi dga' bas phyin ci log
T02D1203:241b-24: gi mtshan ma mi mthong ba'i phyir lam gyi bzhi
T02D1203:241b-25: mdo ru bsdu'o // yang sum mdor gyes pa ru ni /
T02D1203:241b-26: autpala'i snying po brgyad pa dang bcas pa'i lte bar ro //
T02D1203:241b-27: dur khrod ni dbugs dang bral ba'i byang chub sems kyi ro //
T02D1203:241b-28: chu ngogs ni bde chen di zhes man ngag gis zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:241b-29: da ni gtor ma bshad de /
T02D1203:241b-30: lhag ma 'am ni yang na phud //
T02D1203:241b-31: ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:241b-32: rang gnas phyir na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:241b-33: sgrub pa po rang gi khyim du phyin pa ste /
T02D1203:241b-34: gtor ma btang la zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1203:241b-35: 'khor lo ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:241b-36: 'khor gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni mi gcig gi snod brtag pa yin te /
T02D1203:241b-37: kun la yang de yis so //
T02D1203:241b-38: slob dpon la ni dum bu gcig / ces bya
T02D1203:241b-39: ba ni thod pa gling gcig pa ru bdud rtsi
T02D1203:241b-40: dbul lo // 'bad pa yis ni bsrung bar bya //
T02D1203:241b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:241b-43: mi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig yin no //
T02D1203:241b-44: ma rgyud kyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02D1203:241b-45: g-yon gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:242a-0: rnal 'byor ma brtag pa'i don gyi phyir @242a * //
T02D1203:242a-1: 'ong na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:242a-3: gtor ma chen po'i dus su ni /
T02D1203:242a-4: mkha' 'gro ma 'ong ba srid pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1203:242a-6: brtag pa'i don gyi phyir zhes gsungs to /
T02D1203:242a-7: dam tshig brtag pa'i ched du don 'ongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02D1203:242a-9: re zhig 'jigs par mi bya ste //
T02D1203:242a-11: mkha' 'gro ba ma rnams de la'o //
T02D1203:242a-15: rim pas de rnams 'ongs nas so //
T02D1203:242a-16: rang nyid dam tshig dang ldan par byas la /
T02D1203:242a-17: de kho na nyid la dmigs pas zhum pa'i sems mi skyed de /
T02D1203:242a-18: de kho na nyid dang ldan pas seng+ge lta bu ste /
T02D1203:242a-19: byol song lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa la mi 'jigs pas na seng+ge'i gzugs kyis spyod pas /
T02D1203:242a-20: rnam pa thams cad du 'jigs pa med par spyod pas ni /
T02D1203:242a-21: de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs su 'gro ba'o //
T02D1203:242a-22: de yang rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:242a-23: de yang rnal 'byor ma kun gzugs sna tshogs dang /
T02D1203:242a-25: skad sna tshogs rab tu byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lus kyi brda dang /
T02D1203:242a-26: de'i lan du dag gi brda /
T02D1203:242a-27: de'i lan dang rim pa bzhin gsungs so //
T02D1203:242a-28: de dang lhan cig gtor ma chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:242a-29: dngos grub rnyed pa'i rgyu yin pas //
T02D1203:242a-30: gtor ma la sogs pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1203:242a-31: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel /
T02D1203:242a-32: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1203:242a-34: // / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:242a-35: mdor bsdus pa ni yan lag rgyas par bshad pa'i don rigs nas /
T02D1203:242a-36: bcom ldan 'das la dkyil 'khor gyis nges pa'i don zhugs pa ji ltar lags zhes zhus pa'o //
T02D1203:242a-37: sngar gsungs pa'i rgyud don las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:242a-38: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa dang /
T02D1203:242a-39: mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:242a-40: de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po //
T02D1203:242a-42: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nang gi rim pa dang /
T02D1203:242b-0: phyi'i rim pa ni @242b de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin no //
T02D1203:242b-1: de'i dbang po ni bcom ldan 'das yin te /
T02D1203:242b-2: de bas na bdag po yin no //
T02D1203:242b-3: rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba //
T02D1203:242b-5: rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab rgyud rnams su
T02D1203:242b-6: rnyed par dka' ba de 'dir gsal bar bstan pa'o
T02D1203:242b-7: // byang chub sems dang bha ga sku //
T02D1203:242b-8: dkyil 'khor gsum ni rab mchog go //
T02D1203:242b-9: zhes bya ba ni sngar ka ba gcig dang /
T02D1203:242b-10: sogs dgu la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D1203:242b-11: rim pa gnyis bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1203:242b-12: 'og nas 'byung ba'i don rnams kyi dkyil 'khor byang chub sems la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:242b-13: de dag gi phyi dang nang dang gnyis so //
T02D1203:242b-14: ci'i phyir byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa gsum gyi phyi dang nang yin zhe na /
T02D1203:242b-15: de dag ni phyi dang nang du dbye ste /
T02D1203:242b-17: gnyis su med pa'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D1203:242b-18: sku dang bha ga'i dkyil 'khor dang ;
T02D1203:242b-19: / gsum pa'i byang chub sems brtag pa //
T02D1203:242b-20: phyi dang nang gi rim pa yis //
T02D1203:242b-21: de dag kun du bshad par brjod //
T02D1203:242b-23: yang gleng gzhi'i phyi ma'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1203:242b-24: lus kyi dkyil 'khor brjod pa dang //
T02D1203:242b-25: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa dang //
T02D1203:242b-26: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1203:242b-27: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtag //
T02D1203:242b-28: du ma brtag pa'i rab 'byung ba //
T02D1203:242b-29: gang lam mnga' bdag kun du sbyong //
T02D1203:242b-30: yang dag rig dang rab brtag pa'i //
T02D1203:242b-31: phung po rnam gnyis brjod pa yin //
T02D1203:242b-33: yang dpal aindra bhu tis mdzad pa'i dga' ba'i me tog gi phreng ba las kyang /
T02D1203:242b-34: dkyil 'khor sku zhes brjod pa dang //
T02D1203:242b-35: dkyil 'khor bha gar bshad pa dang //
T02D1203:242b-36: dkyil 'khor byang chub sems brjod de //
T02D1203:242b-38: de lta bu'i man ngag shes pas /
T02D1203:242b-39: phyi dang nang gi rim pas spyad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D1203:242b-41: yang na snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba bstan //
T02D1203:242b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:242b-43: yang zhes bya ba'i sngar bshad kyang 'dir bstan zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1203:242b-44: snying po ni yang dag pa'i thugs rje ye shes /
T02D1203:243a-2: bstan pa ni bshad par bya'o //
T02D1203:243a-3: rang gi bde ba ni mandala zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1203:243a-5: len pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:243a-6: sgra'i dbyings la ni len pa'i don te /
T02D1203:243a-7: de yang la ti zhes pa'i yi ge la bzhag ste /
T02D1203:243a-8: phyi ma ti phyis pas snying po len pa'i phyir na /
T02D1203:243a-10: da ni snying po len pa'i don ston te /
T02D1203:243a-12: ces bya ba la sogs pa la mandala zhes pas
T02D1203:243a-13: snying po len pa'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D1203:243a-14: brjod do // kha cig na re /
T02D1203:243a-16: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:243a-17: padma zhes bya ba'i yi ge pa dang /
T02D1203:243a-18: da phyis nas ma bzhag pa ni ma'i yig 'bru 'dab mar zhes bya ba'i sgras bshad do //
T02D1203:243a-19: ma yi yig 'bru lte bar bstan //
T02D1203:243a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang /
T02D1203:243a-21: sgra'i dbyings gzhug dang sbyar la bshad do zer ro //
T02D1203:243a-22: kha cig na re mandala padma zhes bya'i sgras dkyil 'khor padma'i 'dab ma dang /
T02D1203:243a-25: bde ba kun ldan pa bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang mtshungs so zhes zer ro //
T02D1203:243a-26: kha cig na re ma'i yig 'brus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:243a-27: ma ti zhes bya ba'i ti phyis pa'i ma dang sa ru sbyar ro ;
T02D1203:243a-28: / na'i yig 'bru chu ni pi na'i dang 'ge'u phyis pa'o //
T02D1203:243a-29: de bzhin du da ha ni bsreg pa ste /
T02D1203:243a-31: des na da'i yig 'bru ni me zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:243a-33: 'byung ba bzhi pos ni phyi nang gi dngos po kun la khyab pa yin no //
T02D1203:243a-34: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor lnga po kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1203:243a-35: de'i don bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni /
T02D1203:243a-36: yang ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor bstan //
T02D1203:243a-37: rang gi bde ba len pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:243a-38: zhes bya ba'i nges tshig dang bcas nas bshad pa dang /
T02D1203:243a-40: ye shes rnyed pa yi ni phyir //
T02D1203:243a-41: bde ba yi ni chen po len //
T02D1203:243a-43: skabs 'dir sgra'i dbyi gzhug mi dgos la /
T02D1203:243a-45: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam pa thams cad du yang gdul bya rnams la /
T02D1203:243a-46: log pa'i chos gsungs mi srid pas na /
T02D1203:243a-47: kho bo ni mi 'dod pas snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1203:243b-0: @243b 'on kyang 'dir bka' stsal pa'i gzhung bzhin bshad pa la ni skyon med do //
T02D1203:243b-1: ma'i yig 'bru zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:243b-2: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snying po len pa'i don gsungs pa ni /
T02D1203:243b-5: 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa'o ;
T02D1203:243b-6: / lte bar bstan pa ni 'dab ma brgyad dang bcas pa /
T02D1203:243b-7: ge sar dag ni gsum pa dang bcas pa /
T02D1203:243b-8: la'i yig 'bru lte bar bshad pa ni /
T02D1203:243b-11: gsum pa'i lte ba dang bcas pa snying po rnams
T02D1203:243b-12: ni la'i yig 'bru don gyis blangs la ni bde
T02D1203:243b-14: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi snying po len pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
T02D1203:243b-15: ma yi yig 'bru rin chen grags //
T02D1203:243b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yon pa'o //
T02D1203:243b-17: de dag gi byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i snying po len pa'i phyir don bshad pa ni /
T02D1203:243b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pas la'i don to //
T02D1203:243b-20: k'a snang ba bzhi bsgoms pa'i rang gi snying po len pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:243b-21: ba ni snang ba'i 'du shes grags //
T02D1203:243b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas len pa'o //
T02D1203:243b-23: dga' ba bzhi dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas snying po len pa ni /

T02D1203:250b-22: par rtog pa 'byung ba bsrung ba'i phyir gtor ma
T02D1203:250b-24: 'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D1203:250b-25: der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02D1203:250b-26: 'byung ba ga pur du ni grags //
T02D1203:250b-27: ga pur sems can 'dir ni bstan //
T02D1203:250b-28: sems can snying po ye shes bde //
T02D1203:250b-31: 'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gtang //
T02D1203:250b-32: de ni srog chags bsad pa'o //
T02D1203:250b-33: gcad pa de ni mchog gnas su //
T02D1203:250b-36: dga' ba gsum gyi don thabs dang shes rab kyis 'bad la bsgrub pa ni /
T02D1203:250b-37: 'bad pa yis ni zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1203:250b-38: ba yi yig 'bru bha gar brjod //
T02D1203:250b-39: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:250b-40: ba lam gi sgras gtor ma ste /
T02D1203:250b-41: de yang bha ga'i phyis pas 'grub po //
T02D1203:250b-42: de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid bcom ldan 'das ma'o ;
T02D1203:250b-43: / lim gi yang de bzhin te /
T02D1203:250b-44: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid dpal ye shes thig le'i mtshan ma /
T02D1203:250b-45: de dag sbyor bar mtshon pa can //
T02D1203:250b-46: 'on kyang rnal 'byor pa de dag phyag rgya bzhi
T02D1203:250b-47: las gang yang rung ba cig kyang sbyor ba byas
T02D1203:251a-0: pa las dga' ba gsum po'i @251a * //
T02D1203:251a-1: dngos po'i 'byung ba de nyid bsrungs pas ni phyag rgya chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1203:251a-2: mtshan dang bha gar mnyam sbyor las //
T02D1203:251a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:251a-4: dur khrod yang na chu bo'i ngogs //
T02D1203:251a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnas bstan pa yin no //
T02D1203:251a-6: rnal 'byor ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1203:251a-7: ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:251a-8: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i sku
T02D1203:251a-9: ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gtor ma byin gyis brlab
T02D1203:251a-10: par bya zhing sbyin pa dang gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1203:251a-11: dur khrod dang dbugs dbyung gi gnas //
T02D1203:251a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
T02D1203:251a-13: skye ba gsum pa dum bu brgyad par bya //
T02D1203:251a-14: dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'gyel //
T02D1203:251a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sa bstan te /
T02D1203:251a-16: gsang ba ni snod dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1203:251a-17: padma'i bya dgongs ngo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:251a-18: dur khrod gsang ba'i gnas kyi sna la rtsa ba'i nang du'o ;
T02D1203:251a-19: / de'i dbus ni snying po 'bab pa lan gsum
T02D1203:251a-20: skye ba'i byang chub kyi ro dbugs dang bral ba'i
T02D1203:251a-21: gnas rin po che gtsug gtor nang na /
T02D1203:251a-22: de yang mar ngo'i brgyad kyi dus su'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D1203:251a-23: mar ngo'i sgras ni mtshan mo nyid rtog med ma'o //
T02D1203:251a-24: brgyad ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'i lte ba dang
T02D1203:251a-25: gser [*ge sar?] du bcas pa'i dus kyi gnas su'o
T02D1203:251a-26: // de yi don ni 'di lta ste / sha
T02D1203:251a-27: yi yig 'bru padma dag / ces bya ba la
T02D1203:251a-28: // sogs pa la // sgra'i dbye ba dang /
T02D1203:251a-29: gzhug pa ni shuddha padma zhes bya ba la /
T02D1203:251a-30: 'on yang sngon du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya ste /
T02D1203:251a-31: 'dir padma'i lte ba dang bcas pa'i don gyis 'dab
T02D1203:251a-32: ma brgyad par du ma bu brgyad kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1203:251a-33: dang ldan pa / de bzhin lan gsum 'bab pa gsum pa'i don dang /
T02D1203:251a-34: de'i 'og tu padma'i snod dum bu gcig pa nyid
T02D1203:251a-35: du ro chen po'i bdud rtsis gang zhing rgyas pa'i
T02D1203:251a-36: don ni // gtor ma sbyin pa'i gnas dang ldan pa nyid do //
T02D1203:251a-37: des na rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba las /
T02D1203:251a-38: nyams su myong ba dang bral ba rnyed pas phyag rgya chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D1203:251a-39: de nyid la chu'i ngogs zhes kyang bshad do //
T02D1203:251a-40: chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha //
T02D1203:251a-42: byang chub kyi sems chu bo chen po 'bab pa'i ngogs te /
T02D1203:251b-0: rnam par @251b rtog pa bzlog pa'i don bde ba
T02D1203:251b-1: chen po'i chung ngogs dga' ba'i rim gyis rin po
T02D1203:251b-2: che'i gnas su nyams su myong nas yang bde ba
T02D1203:251b-3: chen por gshegs pa la chu po'i ngogs zhes bya'o
T02D1203:251b-4: // yang na de ni rtog med ma //
T02D1203:251b-6: bde ba byang chub kyi sems kyi chu bo'i rgyun
T02D1203:251b-7: mi 'chad par dus rtag tu phra ba'i yang phra
T02D1203:251b-9: 'on yang skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D1203:251b-10: ye shes dang ldan pas gtor ma sbyin zhes gsungs so //
T02D1203:251b-11: de bsrung ba yi don du ni //
T02D1203:251b-13: bde ba'i ye shes rang bzhin dga' ba la glo
T02D1203:251b-14: bur ba'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i gdon gyi
T02D1203:251b-15: dngos po ste / de yang rlung gi dbang gis 'byung ba la /
T02D1203:251b-16: rang bzhin dga' ba'o srog gi rlung gis bsrung bar bya ste sbyin pa'i don to //
T02D1203:251b-17: gtor ma kun du 'bab sbyin no //
T02D1203:251b-21: rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa kun gyis rang bzhin
T02D1203:251b-22: dga' chen po'i rgyal po kho na la 'bad par
T02D1203:251b-23: bya / nan tan du bsgrub par bya /
T02D1203:251b-24: de nyid phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs
T02D1203:251b-25: yang dag pa'i ye shes yin zhes bya ba la
T02D1203:251b-26: sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02D1203:251b-27: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel ;
T02D1203:251b-28: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bco lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1203:251b-30: // / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba las sogs pa la /
T02D1203:251b-31: mtshan nyid las skyes zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:251b-32: de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las chos nyid kyis mtshan nyid skyes pa ste /
T02D1203:251b-33: stong pa nyid las stong pa nyid skye ba'o //
T02D1203:251b-34: de rang gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:251b-35: de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
T02D1203:251b-36: de ltar min na mi mthun no //
T02D1203:251b-38: kun rdzob kyi thabs khyad par can las don dam
T02D1203:251b-39: pa'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba ma yin na
T02D1203:251b-40: / dris pa dang mthun par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1203:251b-44: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid phyir //
T02D1203:251b-46: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes tshig dang ye shes
T02D1203:251b-47: las 'das pa rtag tu shar ba'i rang bzhin thams
T02D1203:251b-50: mthong ba la sogs pa dang bral ba /
T02D1203:252a-1: phebs pa'i rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1203:252a-2: de bas brjod par mi nus so //
T02D1203:252a-4: de nyid la spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad kyis brjod du med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1203:252a-6: rang bzhin ye shes ye shes tshig dang bral //
T02D1203:252a-7: sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong //
T02D1203:252a-8: brjod med ma skyes ma 'gags pa //
T02D1203:252a-9: rang rig pa yi bdag nyid do //
T02D1203:252a-11: 'on kyang kun rdzob kyi thabs kyi rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di'o //
T02D1203:252a-12: de kho'i bdag gsum de snang ba //
T02D1203:252a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snang ba'i ye shes
T02D1203:252a-14: bzhi'i rim pa dang sbyar te bshad ces bya ba'i
T02D1203:252a-15: tha tshig go ; / cha dang thig le dang ni tshul //
T02D1203:252a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:252a-17: 'khor lo la sogs pa dang sbyar nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i don du bshad pa ni /
T02D1203:252a-18: dpal rgyal po chen po na bh'um t'i sprul pa'i
T02D1203:252a-19: skus bka' stsal te de nyid bla ma chen po
T02D1203:252a-20: yin pas bdag kyang de la brten te bshad pa'o
T02D1203:252a-22: dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud las lung bstan pa 'og nas 'byung ste /
T02D1203:252a-23: de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i man ngag gis 'di'i don khong du chung par bya'o //
T02D1203:252a-24: de yang de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma'i rgyud
T02D1203:252a-25: kyi don dang 'di la dgongs nas mdzad pa yin
T02D1203:252a-26: pas 'dir drang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02D1203:252a-27: rgyud rnams su rgyas btab nas bzhugs pa ni /
T02D1203:252a-28: bla ma'i bka' la brten te sgrub thabs dang /
T02D1203:252a-29: 'grel pa la sogs pa'i man ngag gis the tshom med par dngos grub rnyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
T02D1203:252a-30: bdag gis kyang bla ma dam pa chen pos mdzad
T02D1203:252a-31: pa'i man ngag gi gzhung 'dir btsud cing bla ma
T02D1203:252a-32: dam pa la brten pa yin no //
T02D1203:252a-33: dngos po rten la sogs bye brag //
T02D1203:252a-34: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:252a-35: bde ba chen po'i rgyal po rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1203:252a-36: 'di ni brjod pa dang bral ba yin na yang
T02D1203:252a-37: / thabs kyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gsungs so //
T02D1203:252a-38: da ni 'bras bu'i don bshad do /
T02D1203:252a-39: kun rdzob rnams pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1203:252a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:252a-41: longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i sku kun rdzob
T02D1203:252a-42: kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid can gzung 'dzin gyi rnam
T02D1203:252a-43: par rtog pa ji snyed pa las 'grol ba la
T02D1203:252b-0: / @252b byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02D1203:252b-1: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
T02D1203:252b-3: ji ltar chu'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan gcig shar bas
T02D1203:252b-4: chu'i snod kyi bye brag tha dad pa rnams su
T02D1203:252b-5: snang zhing gsal pa bzhin du /
T02D1203:252b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang gzugs kyi sku'i bdag nyid ni //
T02D1203:252b-7: rang rang gi bsam pa dang /
T02D1203:252b-9: ji lta ba bzhin du gsal zhing mthong ngo //
T02D1203:252b-10: 'on kyang snod dang chu la skyon yod pa'i zla ba ni de lta ma yin te /
T02D1203:252b-12: rnal 'byor pa'i snod kyang skyon med cing dag par bya'o //
T02D1203:252b-13: de nyid ni gzugs kyi sku'i rang bzhin snod skyon dang bral ba'i bdag nyid la snang ngo //
T02D1203:252b-15: ji ltar ri bong can gyi gzugs //
T02D1203:252b-16: skyon med chu la snang ba bzhin //
T02D1203:252b-17: bde chen rnam rtog bral ba yang //
T02D1203:252b-18: rang sems dag la so sor snang //
T02D1203:252b-21: ji ltar zla ba bshad gyur pa //
T02D1203:252b-22: tshad med gzugs brnyan snang ba rnams //
T02D1203:252b-23: dang ba'i chu snod snang 'gyur yang //
T02D1203:252b-24: zla ba'i gzugs ni gnyis 'gyur med //
T02D1203:252b-25: de bzhin chags bral mkhyen ldan rnams //
T02D1203:252b-26: chags med rnam par 'tshang rgya ba //
T02D1203:252b-27: zhing rnams kun la so sor snang //
T02D1203:252b-28: sangs rgyas nyid la gnyis kyis kyang med //
T02D1203:252b-30: ngon dam pa yi rang bzhin no //
T02D1203:252b-31: yang dag rtogs pa'i gnas med do //
T02D1203:252b-33: chos kyi sku spros pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa 'di yin no zhes /
T02D1203:252b-34: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi gzigs pa de /
T02D1203:252b-35: don dam par bstan pa ni /
T02D1203:252b-37: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
T02D1203:252b-38: kyi snying po gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba
T02D1203:252b-41: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid do //
T02D1203:252b-42: da ni de la sgrub pa'i thabs bshad de /
T02D1203:252b-43: thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D1203:252b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:252b-45: de ltar yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:252b-47: thabs kyi mtshan nyid sngar gong du bshad kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1203:252b-48: 'dir yang rgyu'i don bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1203:252b-49: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid ni /
T02D1203:252b-50: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:253a-0: @253a * // rnam par shes pa gsum gyi bdag nyid rgyu'i rang bzhin /
T02D1203:253a-1: rtsa ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
T02D1203:253a-2: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i yid la sogs pa'i
T02D1203:253a-3: rnam par shes pa'i bye brag gi rang bzhi gi
T02D1203:253a-4: rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa ni
T02D1203:253a-6: mang po'i mtshan nyid gsal ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa'o //
T02D1203:253a-7: yang na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni /
T02D1203:253a-8: lus dang ngag yid gsum dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1203:253a-9: de'i don gyis gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya ba yin no //
T02D1203:253a-10: zla ba de mchog gi tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha'i tshad do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:253a-11: tshogs ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams so //
T02D1203:253a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1203:253a-14: gong dang 'og gi khyad par gyi bdag por 'gyur te /
T02D1203:253a-16: mtha' ni 'khor rnams dang gnas dang bcas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:253a-17: tshad ni sngar bshad pa rnams dang /
T02D1203:253a-18: phyis 'byung ba rnams gtan la phab pa'i tshad do //
T02D1203:253a-19: phyag rgya chen po yid kyi rnam par shes pa /
T02D1203:253a-20: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:253a-21: yid nyid gtso bor gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1203:253a-24: bsgrub par bya ba thams cad yid kyi cho 'phrul gyis byed do //
T02D1203:253a-25: snang ba nyi bdag po phyag rgya chen po'i ngo
T02D1203:253a-26: bo grub pas kun rdzob dang mthun par snang ba'i
T02D1203:253a-27: ye shes so // rang gi ngo bo ni de
T02D1203:253a-28: rang thams cad kyi ngo bor grub pa yin no
T02D1203:253a-29: ye shes so // // de rnams kyi kun gzhi ni rgya la /
T02D1203:253a-30: gzhan dag ni 'bras bu yin pa dang /
T02D1203:253a-31: kun rdzob kyi gnas thabs ni sems can rnams la rgyu'i bdag nyid du gnas pa las /
T02D1203:253a-32: 'bras bu 'byung ba'i mthu dang ldan par yod do //
T02D1203:253a-34: de nyid gsum dag rgyur ni grags //
T02D1203:253a-35: zla ba la sogs 'bras bdag nyid //
T02D1203:253a-37: yang dag mtha' dang rnam par shes //
T02D1203:253a-38: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
T02D1203:253a-40: sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas //
T02D1203:253a-41: 'on kyang glo bur dri mas khyab //
T02D1203:253a-42: de sangs rgyas na ni sangs rgyas rgyas nyid //
T02D1203:253a-43: nges par yin par the tshom med //
T02D1203:253a-45: da ni de rang nyid don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad de /
T02D1203:253a-46: de'i mtha' la rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam mkha'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:253b-0: rang @253b bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dpe nam mkhas kyang gzhal du mad pa /
T02D1203:253b-1: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes spros pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1203:253b-2: yang na sprul pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02D1203:253b-3: sems can la rtsa'i 'khor lo rnams rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:253b-4: de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i rim pa
T02D1203:253b-5: bzhin sbyar ba'i don ni der bshad pa yin no
T02D1203:253b-6: // yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du /
T02D1203:253b-7: rnam pa la sogs pa shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:253b-8: 'di yang rang bzhin gyis gnas pa ste /
T02D1203:253b-9: 'o na srog ma ni de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D1203:253b-10: 'dzin pa ni zla bde mchog gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1203:253b-11: ro ma ni phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1203:253b-12: rtog med ma ni rnam pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i mtha' rang bzhin no //
T02D1203:253b-13: sems can rnams la rtsa'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1203:253b-14: rnam par shes pa rnams dang /
T02D1203:253b-15: rtsa bzhi po dang ldan pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:253b-16: rgyu'i dpal ye shes thig ler bshad pa dang /
T02D1203:253b-17: lhag ma yang sngon bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1203:253b-18: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:253b-19: kho na nyid ces ba le'u bcu drug pa'i bshad
T02D1203:253b-21: / sbyor ba drug la sogs pa'i don gyis rang
T02D1203:253b-22: bzhin dga' ba mchog gi nam mkha'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1203:253b-23: don gsungs pa / de nas lha mo rab tu dgyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:253b-24: dur khrod pa la sogs pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:253b-28: rtsa la sogs pa'i don bcom ldan 'das nyid le nges par zhu ba'i don to //
T02D1203:253b-29: me bzad 'di ni rnam par khyab //
T02D1203:253b-31: rus pa la sogs rab bkram khyab ;
T02D1203:253b-32: / ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
T02D1203:253b-34: nang gi yang bshad pa yin no //
T02D1203:253b-35: gsang ba'i nges pa'i don gyi dur khrod ni /
T02D1203:253b-36: ga bur gzhan min zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis bshad do //
T02D1203:253b-37: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bdag med par sngon pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:253b-38: dur khrod kyi dngos po bshad pa yin no //
T02D1203:253b-39: de yang phyi'i don rang la rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid du bshad pa ni /
T02D1203:253b-40: nang dag gsang ba'i dur khrod do //
T02D1203:253b-41: de bzhin du dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud 'di'i don bshad pas sgom pa po dang /
T02D1203:254a-0: bsgoms phar bya ba'i don dam pa'i phyogs su @254a * //
T02D1203:254a-1: dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te /
T02D1203:254a-2: 'on kyang kun rdzob thabs kyi bye brag tu sgom po dang /
T02D1203:254a-4: sgom par bya ba ni mi snang ngo //
T02D1203:254a-5: de'i phyir rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi ye shes thig le la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:254a-6: de bzhin du shing la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang bshad pa'o //
T02D1203:254a-8: 'di la rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar srog rtsa dang lhan cig bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:254a-10: srog rtsa'i nang du 'gro ba ni gsum ste /
T02D1203:254a-14: 'od kyi bdag nyid gtum mo 'jug par byed /
T02D1203:254a-15: gzung 'dzin dang bral ba rtog med ma gnas par byed /
T02D1203:254a-16: ye shes kyi rang bzhin bya gdong ma 'gro bar byed /
T02D1203:254a-17: yang na g-yas phyogs kyi ro can nam 'gro bar byed /
T02D1203:254a-19: dbus su gnas pa'i rtog med ma byang chub kyi sems gnas par byed do //
T02D1203:254a-20: des ni dga' ba'i bzhi'i gnas kyang bstan //
T02D1203:254a-22: thog ma'i sku'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1203:254a-23: de bzhin du dbus dang tha ma'i gsung dang thugs kyang ye shes so //
T02D1203:254a-25: gsum gyi bdag nyid rtog med ma'i ngo bo dang rang bzhin dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1203:254a-27: gsum gyi dngos po gsum pa bdag nyid //
T02D1203:254a-28: thog ma tha ma rnam par byed //
T02D1203:254a-29: rtsa dang dga' bdag nyid skye med //
T02D1203:254a-30: de'i phyir rtog med rang bzhin dga' //
T02D1203:254a-32: zhal bzang ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:254a-33: bcom ldan 'das ma la bos nas nges pa'i don la bstan pa'o //
T02D1203:254a-34: der shes par bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:254a-36: rtsa rnams thams cad kyi don shes par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1203:254a-37: yang kha cig yang dag pa'i man ngag dang bral bas drang ba'i don gyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02D1203:254a-38: rtsa'i man ngag gi ye shes la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur pa yin te /
T02D1203:254a-40: de dag gi thun mong gi man ngag tsam la
T02D1203:254a-41: rten nas nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir na
T02D1203:254a-42: / mkhas pa rnams ni de dag la yid ches par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1203:254a-43: de'i rtog pa de bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1203:254a-45: shar dang nub pa'i dus su rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung
T02D1203:254b-0: ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @254b so
T02D1203:254b-1: ; da ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi don bshad de /
T02D1203:254b-2: yid dang mthun pa'i rang gnas su //
T02D1203:254b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1203:254b-4: rnal 'byor pa'i spyod pa dang mthun pa'i gnas gang
T02D1203:254b-5: yang rung ba der sgrub pa po yid 'jug pas
T02D1203:254b-7: phyi la sogs pa dang bral ba'i gnas ni rang gi gnas rang khyim zhes brda'i don to //
T02D1203:254b-8: skyon ni 'byung po la sogs pa'i bar chad byed
T02D1203:254b-9: pa'i dngos po rnams spang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D1203:254b-10: go // thams cad ni rgyal po dang /
T02D1203:254b-12: cho ma rkun la sogs pa rnams med par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1203:254b-13: yang na rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid rnams skyon te /
T02D1203:254b-14: 'di rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni skyon thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D1203:254b-15: rtog pa dang bcas pa'i thad chad par 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin ni sra ba'o //
T02D1203:254b-16: spangs pa ni gnyid kyis spyod pa la dben pa'i
T02D1203:254b-17: thabs kyi bye brag gis de spangs pa'i don to
T02D1203:254b-18: // ye shes dang ldan pa'i sku'i bdag nyid du gnas pa'i lus pos zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1203:254b-19: phyin ci log gi rnam par rtog pa'i rba rlabs g-yeng ba'i phyir na rlabs so //
T02D1203:254b-20: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho gsal ba'i spyod pa ni bde ba'o //
T02D1203:254b-21: bde ba'i stan zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:254b-22: bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni ;
T02D1203:254b-23: stan 'jam pa la sogs pa yin pas /
T02D1203:254b-24: padma la sogs pas mtshon pa yin pas 'di skad du /
T02D1203:254b-25: 'dir ni dga' ba'i gdan bshams te /
T02D1203:254b-26: sna tshogs padma ras kyis g-yogs //
T02D1203:254b-27: stan de dag ni thams cad la //
T02D1203:254b-28: ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod //
T02D1203:254b-30: lte ba'i dbus na yod pa'i tshul //
T02D1203:254b-32: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba'i gsung rdo rje'i sa bon /
T02D1203:254b-33: bdag med ma'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid can shes rab ma'i don to /
T02D1203:254b-35: de nyid sprul pa'i 'khor lo gtum mo'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1203:254b-37: chos khyi 'khor lor lte bar bzhugs pa /
T02D1203:254b-38: thugs rdo rje'i sa bon thabs kyi mtshan nyid bskyod pa'i las bgyid pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:254b-39: drag po chen por grags te /
T02D1203:254b-41: thabs dang shes rab bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le dang /
T02D1203:255a-0: yum phyag rgya chen mo'i rang bzhin las kyi @255a * //
T02D1203:255a-1: rlung gis dam tshig gi bdag nyid bskyod pa ni /
T02D1203:255a-2: rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba //
T02D1203:255a-3: bskal pa'i me 'od dang mnyam pa //
T02D1203:255a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:255a-5: dbus na gang zhig 'khor lo yod //
T02D1203:255a-7: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i padma sum cu rtsa
T02D1203:255a-8: gnyis kyi lte bar bde ba chen po'i sku'i sa
T02D1203:255a-12: dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin du gnas so //
T02D1203:255a-14: nye ba'i srog dang tshim byed kyi rlung dang /
T02D1203:255a-15: de gsum dbyer med par gnas pa ni /
T02D1203:255a-16: srog gi rlung gi gi rang gi ngo bo zhes so //
T02D1203:255a-17: bde ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa ni de'i yon tan gyis snying gar 'ongs nas so //
T02D1203:255a-18: mtshan ma'i rtags ma byung ba ji srid pa de
T02D1203:255a-19: srid kyi bar du gnas pa de ni gnas su'o
T02D1203:255a-20: // de'i phyir rtag tu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:255a-21: 'on yang bla ma'i thal nas zhal du brgyud pa'i bshad par /
T02D1203:255a-22: de nas aom yig rang ngor grags //
T02D1203:255a-25: don dam pa'i byang chub kyis sems sku gsum dbyer
T02D1203:255a-26: med pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i sku dang
T02D1203:255a-27: bcas pa'o // des ni 'di skad ston te /
T02D1203:255a-28: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid //
T02D1203:255a-29: sbyor ba rnams pa gsum du 'dod //
T02D1203:255a-31: kha dog dbyings ni sprul pa'i sku //
T02D1203:255a-32: sngags ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D1203:255a-33: chos kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku //
T02D1203:255a-34: dbyer med sku ni bde chen pa'o //
T02D1203:255a-36: sku de rgyal po bde ba chen po 'di rdo
T02D1203:255a-37: rje 'dzin nyid rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid byang
T02D1203:255a-38: chub sems kyi ye shes spros pa dang bral bar
T02D1203:255a-40: rnam par shes pa sku rgyal nyid du bshad do //
T02D1203:255a-41: yang na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa mi long lta bu'i ye shes su thim pa'o //
T02D1203:255a-42: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes /
T02D1203:255a-43: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes /
T02D1203:255a-44: tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes /
T02D1203:255a-45: de rnams kun ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D1203:255a-46: bla ma'i zhal nas rnam par shes pa ni /
T02D1203:255a-48: de ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid bde ba chen
T02D1203:255b-0: po'i sku gnyis su med pa'i ye shes @255b su
T02D1203:255b-1: gnas kyang bsams gtan pa las dang pho pas nam
T02D1203:255b-2: mkha'i zla ba bzhin mthong bar mi gyur te /
T02D1203:255b-4: rang gi rnam par rtog pa ma dag pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:255b-5: mi mthong ngo zhes bka' stsal to //
T02D1203:255b-6: srog dang rngub pa 'gog pa yis //
T02D1203:255b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:255b-8: srog ni phyir rgyu ba'i rlung dang /
T02D1203:255b-9: nang du rgyu ba'i rang bzhin ni rngub pa /
T02D1203:255b-10: 'gog pa ni mnyam par gnas pa'i dus bsam du med pa'i don to //
T02D1203:255b-11: de dag ni bzang po'i dus 'o ma'i rgyun bzhin 'bab pa dang /
T02D1203:255b-12: ngan pa'i dus ma'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba dang /
T02D1203:255b-13: gnyig med pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid
T02D1203:255b-14: bsam du med par mnyam pa'i dang zhes pa'i don
T02D1203:255b-15: to // srog dang rngub pa bza' ba gsol //
T02D1203:255b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1203:255b-17: de rnams rnal 'byor dbang shes nas //
T02D1203:255b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:255b-19: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i don gyis bla ma nyid kyi
T02D1203:255b-20: bshad gzhung gi man ngag brgyud pa'i man ngag rim
T02D1203:255b-21: pa thob pas bshad cing par 'gyur gyi /
T02D1203:255b-22: sgra tshad la sogs pa'i blo zhe na /
T02D1203:255b-23: pas 'dir ni ma yin zhes 'brel pa'o //
T02D1203:255b-24: de'i phyir bla ma mnyes par bya //
T02D1203:255b-27: gang zhig nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan ni //
T02D1203:255b-28: de ni zla ba gyen du byed //
T02D1203:255b-29: yang na tshangs bzhi rnam dbye byas //
T02D1203:255b-30: rnam par shes la gshegs par gsol //
T02D1203:255b-32: de bzhin du gzhung gnyis su bstan cing bshad bshad do /
T02D1203:255b-33: 'di la ta bu'i 'dus pa'i sa'i dur khrod chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:255b-34: gnas 'dir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dam tshig
T02D1203:255b-35: can thams cad 'du zhing nyon mongs pa'i bgegs 'byung
T02D1203:255b-36: po rnams rlag par byed pa bdag dang dur khrod
T02D1203:255b-38: 'khor ba'i chos phung po la sogs pa dang /
T02D1203:255b-39: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1203:255b-40: yon tan dpag tu med pa thams cad 'byung ba'i
T02D1203:255b-42: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi phyir zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:255b-43: gnas khyab par can 'di'i yon tan gyis /
T02D1203:255b-44: brangs [*grangs] med pa'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1203:255b-45: dngos grub thob ces bya ba la sogs pa sgra
T02D1203:255b-46: ji sgra ji bzhin par gsungs so //
T02D1203:256a-0: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u @256a * //
T02D1203:256a-3: // / yang bcom ldan mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:256a-4: srog gi dbyug pa'i gnag zhig steng //
T02D1203:256a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:256a-6: srog gi dbyug pa ni dbus kyi srog rtsa ni
T02D1203:256a-7: kun gyi steng gi dngos po ka ba'i gzugs su
T02D1203:256a-8: gnas pa'o // mgrin pa'i steng nas yang ni /
T02D1203:256a-9: rang nyid kyi sor gyis gzhal na sor bcu gnyis te /
T02D1203:256a-10: spyi bo'i gtsug nas mgrin pa'i steng gi bar du cha phra ba tsam ste /
T02D1203:256a-11: mdud pa med ces grangs pas na /
T02D1203:256a-12: gang zhig steng zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:256a-13: 'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed //
T02D1203:256a-15: sprul pa'i gnas thabs dang shes rab kyis rdo rje dang padma'i tshad ni sor drug tu bshad de /
T02D1203:256a-16: 'on kyang mthun pa ma yin pa'i tsha ni 'dir ma bshad de /
T02D1203:256a-17: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:256a-18: mdud pa dang grangs kyi rim pa bstan pa la bsnyag go //
T02D1203:256a-19: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid sprul pa ste /
T02D1203:256a-21: rtsa ba'i padma la gos pa med pa'i don dang ldan pa ni /
T02D1203:256a-22: padma'i 'dab ma'i rim pa'i grangs so //
T02D1203:256a-23: de yang rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1203:256a-24: 'di ni 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang brgyad dang /
T02D1203:256a-25: gsum pa'i don ni drug gi phyed do //
T02D1203:256a-26: de nyid kyi gnas bgyid pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:256a-27: spyan 'dra padma zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1203:256a-28: 'di ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i lte ba dang bcas
T02D1203:256a-29: pa'i bdag nyid ye shes kyi spyan snying por bshad
T02D1203:256a-30: do // srog pa rtsa'i snying po 'di rtsa thams cad kyi rtsa ba de dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1203:256a-32: ro ma dang rtog med ma zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1203:256a-33: lte nang du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:256a-34: 'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba'i bdag nyid srog rtsa de'i nang na gsum pa'o //
T02D1203:256a-35: chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems snang ba
T02D1203:256a-36: bde ba chen po'i rgyus rtsa ba nyid dus rtag
T02D1203:256a-37: tu rtog med ma dang ldan pa'i don gyis tshangs
T02D1203:256a-40: rtsa ba rtsa yi nang 'ongs nas //
T02D1203:256a-42: padma'i 'dab ma gsum la sogs pa sprul pa'i 'khor
T02D1203:256a-43: lor gnas pa'i reg bya dang bral ba'i 'dab ma'o
T02D1203:256a-44: // skye ru bcar te gnas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1203:256b-0: rtsa gsum po'i 'dab ma'i sker srog rtsa bcar @256b
T02D1203:256b-2: gnas dang gnas pa'i tshul du 'khyud pa'i dngos por gnas pa'o //
T02D1203:256b-3: gug pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor grags //
T02D1203:256b-5: 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du 'dab ma gsum pa'o //
T02D1203:256b-6: de'i nang na gnas pa'i lte ba bya gtor ma
T02D1203:256b-7: dang bcas pa'i gug pa'i zhes 'khyud pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1203:256b-9: bug phra mos nang nas ldan //
T02D1203:256b-11: srog ma'i bdag nyid rtsa gsum dang bcas nas /
T02D1203:256b-12: lar rtog med ma shin tu cha phra ba'i sngod
T02D1203:256b-13: [*sdod] bu dang bcas pa sa'i myu gu'i rnam pa
T02D1203:256b-14: rgyu dang / 'bras bu'i dbye bas so //
T02D1203:256b-15: de ni srog ba rtsa ni nyid //
T02D1203:256b-16: khams gsum du ni rten yin no //
T02D1203:256b-18: srog pa rtsa 'di 'dod khams la sogs pa'i bdag
T02D1203:256b-19: nyid kyi rten 'di rang khams gsum gyi sgra ni
T02D1203:256b-20: / lus la sogs pa 'dzin ma dang /
T02D1203:256b-23: yang na dga' ba gsum gyi rten byed pa yin no //
T02D1203:256b-24: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med kyis //
T02D1203:256b-25: zhes bya ba ni srid pa dang mya ngan las
T02D1203:256b-26: 'das pa'i rgyu 'bras so sor bde ba'i don gnyis
T02D1203:256b-27: su med pa'i ye shes spros pa dang bral ba'i
T02D1203:256b-29: rtsa ba 'bras bu rgya yis btab //
T02D1203:256b-31: yang na rgyu rtsa'i dngos po 'bras bu mkha' 'gro
T02D1203:256b-32: ma'i mtshan nyid de dag rnams dbyer med pa'i rang
T02D1203:256b-33: bzhin gyi ye shes spros pa dang bral ba'i bde
T02D1203:256b-34: ba chen pos rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1203:256b-35: drug phyed rtsa ba dang ldan na //
T02D1203:256b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:256b-37: rtsa bzhi po'i dbyibs 'di la brten pas bcom ldan
T02D1203:256b-38: 'das dpal ye shes thig le 'grub par gyur pa'i
T02D1203:256b-39: phyir / sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D1203:256b-40: rtsa gsum dbye ni 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid can sprul
T02D1203:256b-41: pa'i sku'i bskyed rim gyi skabs su rtsa gsum ste
T02D1203:256b-42: / de nas srog pa rtsa chags /
T02D1203:256b-43: de nas rtsa gzhan rim gyis skye //
T02D1203:256b-44: zhes bcom ldan 'das yum la bka' stsal to //
T02D1203:256b-45: gzhan na nge rtsa ni srog pa rtsa yin /
T02D1203:256b-46: gsum du dbye ba ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i de
T02D1203:256b-47: bzhin rtsa gsum de rang 'bras bu yin zer ro
T02D1203:256b-48: // phan tshul 'brel par gcig dang gsum du bshad
T02D1203:256b-49: pa ni 'jug pa'i dang ldan pa'i rim pas rgyu
T02D1203:257a-2: 'bras bu yang de bzhin yod do //
T02D1203:257a-3: rtsa ba'i 'bras bu la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:257a-4: sngon du bstan pa'i sor drug pa'i dngos kyis gnas bshad pa'o //
T02D1203:257a-5: de nyid ni rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'joms pa'i gnas rtsub pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:257a-6: 'jam pa'i rtog pa can gyi spyod yul ma yin pas gzung bar dka' ba'i phyir phra ba /
T02D1203:257a-7: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtha' nas gsang ba'i rin po che'i gnas su khyab pas ni /
T02D1203:257a-8: rin chen kha nang yan chad de de'o //
T02D1203:257a-9: gzhan na re rdo rje la sor drug ni rin po che la sor gnyis /
T02D1203:257a-11: rin chen kha nang yan chad do ;
T02D1203:257a-13: de ni phra ba dang 'jam pa'i gnas so //
T02D1203:257a-15: slob dpon kha cig gi gzhung las phra ba dang 'jam pa'i /
T02D1203:257a-17: chos kyi 'khor lo ni sems kyi gnas yin pas phra mo 'jam zhes bshad pa dang /
T02D1203:257a-18: yang lte ba'i gnas phra la 'jam zhes pa dang /
T02D1203:257a-19: yang bzhi pa'i gnas nyid ni shin tu phra mo 'jam zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1203:257a-20: yang 'khor lo kun gyi thog ma'i padma'i lte ba'i dbus phra mo 'jam zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1203:257a-21: yang rtsa sbyor ba drug gi bdag nyid kyi gnas ni phra mo 'jam zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1203:257a-22: slob dpon dang dpal badzra pu ti'i zhal snga nas dbus kyi rtsub la ;
T02D1203:257a-23: tha ma'i gnas ni phra mo 'jam pa bdag nyid
T02D1203:257a-24: rang bzhin dga' ba'i yi shes kyi gnas nye bar
T02D1203:257a-25: lta ba zhes bshad do zhes gsungs so //
T02D1203:257a-26: de tsam ye shes thig skud yod / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1203:257a-27: rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nad du
T02D1203:257a-28: yod pa'i 'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i nang du
T02D1203:257a-29: gnas pa sbyor ba drug gi ye shes snang bar
T02D1203:257a-30: byed pa / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis
T02D1203:257a-31: rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dbang sgyur bar
T02D1203:257a-32: byed pa / byed pa'o // de'i phyir rnam shes
T02D1203:257a-33: drug ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs so
T02D1203:257a-34: byed pa / byed pa'o // // da ni dpal ye shes thig le'i tshad dang /
T02D1203:257a-35: sbyor ba drug gi rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i don bshad de /
T02D1203:257a-36: shr'i ni gzhan min 'dir ni cha //
T02D1203:257a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni /
T02D1203:257a-38: shr'i dzny'a na ti la ka zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyis sbyor ba drug gi don ni cha dang /
T02D1203:257b-0: gzhan mchog rnams rim pa bzhin du sbyar @257b ba'i man ngag 'dir bshad pa ni /
T02D1203:257b-1: gug pa'i rnam pa'i kha ru ni //
T02D1203:257b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ni bla
T02D1203:257b-3: ma brgyud pa'i rim pa bar ma chad pas 'dir
T02D1203:257b-4: bshad pa kha las rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1203:257b-5: yang don ni 'dir bshad pa cha'i rang bzhin ma
T02D1203:257b-6: skyes ba'i ngo bo spros pa thams cad dang bral
T02D1203:257b-7: ba'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1203:257b-8: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis su med
T02D1203:257b-11: de nyid ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir na /
T02D1203:257b-13: de nyid ni yi ge dang bral ba'i phyir thig le ste /
T02D1203:257b-14: spros pa'i mtshan mas stong pa zlum pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1203:257b-15: de nyid ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin kyi [*gyi] phyir na dang /
T02D1203:257b-16: gzhan rnam par 'gegs pa'i sgra'i ni na'i yi ge ste /
T02D1203:257b-18: de nyid glo bur ba'i sprin gyi mtshan ma rnams
T02D1203:257b-19: kyis ma gos pa'i phyir bdag nyid nam mkha'i tshul
T02D1203:257b-20: lo // de nyid ni ti la ka'i sgra'i bshad pas de rang du bshad par byas pa'o //
T02D1203:257b-21: de nyid kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul tsam mo //
T02D1203:257b-22: de nyid ni gzhan rnams kun gyi spyod yul du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir ni mchog go //
T02D1203:257b-23: de nyid ni gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad du byung
T02D1203:257b-24: ba'i rang bzhin mchog tu gsang ba'i don gyi phyir
T02D1203:257b-25: na gzhan mchog tu gsungs te bde ba chen po'i
T02D1203:257b-26: rang bzhin 'di chos thams cad kyi ngo bo mtshan
T02D1203:257b-27: nyid kun spangs pa zhes dgongs ba'o //
T02D1203:257b-29: bde ba chen po'i ngo bor grags //
T02D1203:257b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:257b-31: dpal ye shes thig le 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:257b-32: 'dir rtsa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid stong phrag bdun
T02D1203:257b-33: cu rtsa gnyis kyi gtso bo brgya nyi shu rtsa
T02D1203:257b-34: dgu / de las kyang sum cu rtsa gnyis rab bo //
T02D1203:257b-35: de dag rnams kyi lte ba dang bcas pa'i rtsas dbang sgyur ba yis ni /
T02D1203:257b-36: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar the tshom mi bya'o //
T02D1203:257b-37: de bas na rtsa'i gnas kyi don 'di yin te /
T02D1203:257b-38: 'jug pa gnas pa longs spyod yin //
T02D1203:257b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa ni /
T02D1203:257b-41: de bzhin du rtog med ma dbus su gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyi byed pa dang /
T02D1203:258a-0: @258a * // g-yas kyi phyogs kyi ro can ma 'gro ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1203:258a-1: longs spyod mchog gi gnas pa'i rang bzhin mgrin pa'i gnas su //
T02D1203:258a-2: dbang dang mi snad ba kha'i gnas su zhes bstan te //
T02D1203:258a-3: de yang sbyor ba drug la sogs pa'i gnas bgyid pa ni /
T02D1203:258a-4: rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D1203:258a-5: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:258a-6: kho na nyid ces bya ba la bcom brgyad pa'i
T02D1203:258a-8: / bla ma'i yon tan tha ma la dngos dang bral //
T02D1203:258a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:258a-10: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa'i tha mal par 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1203:258a-11: gzung ba'i skyon spangs te gnyis pos dben pa che
T02D1203:258a-12: ba'i yon tan gyi sku la sogs pa brgyan nas
T02D1203:258a-14: de bzhin du rab kyi dbang rnams kyi thob pa
T02D1203:258a-15: dang ldan pa'i don ni mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1203:258a-16: sku yin te / nang gi don dang bcas pa bzhi pa mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1203:258a-17: thugs rje dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs so //
T02D1203:258a-18: de yang 'dir bshad par ma zad de /
T02D1203:258a-20: dbang bskur thob dang de nyid mkhyen //
T02D1203:258a-21: ye shes gnyis dang thugs rje che //
T02D1203:258a-22: rang bzhin bzang dang ser sna med //
T02D1203:258a-23: yang dag rlabs chen dpa' bo dang ;
T02D1203:258a-24: / skal ldan mtshan gyis gang ba dang //
T02D1203:258a-25: phrag dog yul ni rnam par bral //
T02D1203:258a-26: rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa //
T02D1203:258a-27: 'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid //
T02D1203:258a-28: sdom pa la sogs mkhyen pa yin //
T02D1203:258a-29: bla ma de lta bus ni bya //
T02D1203:258a-31: phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral //
T02D1203:258a-33: lha'i sku dang ye shes las grub pa'i lus su gnas pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1203:258a-34: de yang nam mkha' la 'ja' tshon bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D1203:258a-35: slob ma khrims ldan dul ba dad pa can //
T02D1203:258a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin du /
T02D1203:258a-37: bla ma lnga bcu pa dang ;
T02D1203:258a-38: rgyud la sogs pa gzhan dag las kyang /
T02D1203:258a-39: rgyas par bshad pas na 'di'i don ni go sla'o //
T02D1203:258a-40: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:258a-41: kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u bcu dgu pa'i
T02D1203:258a-43: / slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes thogs la 'di gsungs pa /
T02D1203:258b-0: @258b de nas gzhan nyon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras gsungs so //
T02D1203:258b-1: ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs //
T02D1203:258b-3: de'i rim pa ni 'di nyid kyi 'og nas rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir zhes dgongs so //
T02D1203:258b-4: 'o na yang rgyud ni 'brel ba yod pa'i phyir na rgyud do //
T02D1203:258b-9: rgyud ces bya ba rab 'brel te //
T02D1203:258b-10: de yang rab 'brel rnam gsum yin //
T02D1203:258b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:258b-12: rim pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i byung
T02D1203:258b-13: tshul 'di dang gzhan rnams su gsungs pa'i rim pas
T02D1203:258b-14: so // gzhan dag na re dpal de kho na
T02D1203:258b-15: nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i rim pa'i 'byung tshul
T02D1203:258b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin zer
T02D1203:258b-17: so // ro // 'dir bdag gi bla ma'i gzhung ni /
T02D1203:258b-18: 'di'i rim bzhin du dpal bde mchog 'khor lo sdom
T02D1203:258b-19: pa la sogs par yang rim pa bshad pa yod
T02D1203:258b-20: gsungs so // de'i rim pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1203:258b-21: dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud //
T02D1203:258b-22: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pas gsungs so //
T02D1203:258b-23: de skad du yang 'di nyid las /
T02D1203:258b-24: de ltar rim pa thams cad dul //
T02D1203:258b-25: lha mo de khros shes par bya /
T02D1203:258b-28: sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin ;
T02D1203:258b-30: phyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brgyad kyi rim
T02D1203:258b-31: pa sa bon dang mya gu la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1203:258b-32: pa 'byung ba'i dpe bstan pa bzhin du /
T02D1203:258b-33: don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rim pa brgyad po'i 'byung ba'i tshul gyi rgyud do //
T02D1203:258b-34: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la sogs pa'i rgyud la sogs pa bstan pa rnams ni rgyud kun no //
T02D1203:258b-35: dpe rten 'brel brgyad kyi rim pa bshad pas //
T02D1203:258b-36: rgyud kun shes par bya ba ni rim pas rigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1203:258b-37: yang na ye shes 'khor rgyud yin //
T02D1203:258b-39: gang gi don gyis dga' ba dang //
T02D1203:258b-40: ye shes kyi rim pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1203:258b-41: kho na yang nas yang du bsnan cing rtsa ba
T02D1203:258b-42: dang bshad pa'i rgyud la sogs pa 'dir ni gsal
T02D1203:258b-45: yang na don gyi rgyud yin no //
T02D1203:259a-0: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes skye ba med pa'i aa'i rang bzhin nyid don yin @259a * //
T02D1203:259a-2: 'di'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid du yang dag par grub pa'i don dang /
T02D1203:259a-4: yi ge la sogs par 'brel pa'i phyir rgyud do //
T02D1203:259a-5: yang na thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i phyir 'brel pa'o //
T02D1203:259a-6: de yang 'dir rang nas rgyas par ston pa'i phyir zhes bya bas so //
T02D1203:259a-7: yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud //
T02D1203:259a-9: bskyed rim dang rdzogs rim 'brel pa'o //
T02D1203:259a-10: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa la ma brten par ni /
T02D1203:259a-11: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mi rnyed do zhes 'brel pa'o //
T02D1203:259a-12: de'i phyir dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi skabs
T02D1203:259a-13: su bskyed pa'i rim pa sngon du 'gro dgos pa
T02D1203:259a-14: yin te / ltos pa'i dbang gis bskyed pa dang /
T02D1203:259a-16: bskyed pa ni thabs kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid /
T02D1203:259a-18: thabs las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyir rgyud do //
T02D1203:259a-19: gzhan dag ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ces kyang zer ro //
T02D1203:259a-20: lha mo gang du skal ldan mo //
T02D1203:259a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:259a-23: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dbye bas bstan te /
T02D1203:259a-24: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can chad pa'i
T02D1203:259a-25: dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gtum mo gzugs kyi 'od
T02D1203:259a-26: kyi rang bzhin ni padma can zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:259a-27: de ni thabs kyi bdag nyid mgon po dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1203:259a-28: dbye bas rang la thabs dang shes rab gnyis dbye
T02D1203:259a-29: ba'i rim pas ni thabs bcom ldan 'das mchog gi
T02D1203:259a-32: shes rab dang thabs de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D1203:259a-34: kun rdzob dang don dam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis /
T02D1203:259a-35: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi
T02D1203:259a-36: sgo nas rang bzhin dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D1203:259a-37: rgyal po gnyis kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa
T02D1203:259a-38: rten can gyi dngos po la rten dang bral ba'i
T02D1203:259a-39: don btsal bar bya ba 'di ni rgyud ces bya'o
T02D1203:259a-40: // yang na shes rab las byung ba /
T02D1203:259a-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud kyi sgra'i don bshad de /
T02D1203:259a-43: ye shes ni chad pa'i dga' ba ste /
T02D1203:259a-44: chad pa las ni sems can skye ba'i rim pas zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02D1203:259a-45: sa bon la sogs pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas /
T02D1203:259a-47: thabs mnyam par sbyor ba las mi snang ba dang /
T02D1203:259b-0: longs @259b spyod dang rang gi snying ga'i padma'i lte
T02D1203:259b-1: ba'i nang du sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs
T02D1203:259b-2: pa'i lha'i rnam par 'byung ba nyid do //
T02D1203:259b-3: de yang sam skri ta'i sgra la sogs pa'i don to //
T02D1203:259b-4: dga' ba bzhi'i don gyis ni dri ma med pa'i sgrar gsungs pas ni /
T02D1203:259b-6: yang ni sgra'i dbyi gzhug mi dgos pa ni sngon bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D1203:259b-7: de la ye shes kyi dga' ba chad pa'i dga'
T02D1203:259b-8: ba gsum gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid dngos po
T02D1203:259b-9: // de las 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo rdzogs pa'i gzugs /
T02D1203:259b-10: sku gsum gyi rgyu byed pa'i dngos po'am /
T02D1203:259b-11: yang na sku gsum nyid mi snad ba dang ;
T02D1203:259b-13: dbang gi mtshan nyid kyis bshad do //
T02D1203:259b-15: ta yi yig 'bru sku ru grags //
T02D1203:259b-17: na ni de nyid dri ma med //
T02D1203:259b-19: rang bzhin dga' ba'i 'bras bu der rang nyid las bde ba chen po'i sku ste /
T02D1203:259b-20: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum po spangs pa'i sku
T02D1203:259b-21: gnyis su med pa'i brjod pa dang bral ba la
T02D1203:259b-23: de ni de la rang la rgyu'i dngos po'i rang bzhin bstan te /
T02D1203:259b-24: ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab //
T02D1203:259b-25: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:259b-26: de rnams ni 'brel pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i don dang bcas pa'i phyir rgyud do ;
T02D1203:259b-28: ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru //
T02D1203:259b-29: tshul tsam gyis ni gnyis ka ldan //
T02D1203:259b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:259b-31: aa ta'i sgras ni rgyud kyi de nas kyi don la sbyor bar byas ba bshad de /
T02D1203:259b-33: ta'i yig 'bru ni shes rab kyi ngo bo gzugs
T02D1203:259b-34: rtsa 'dzin ma'i mtshan nyid can chad pa'i dga' ba
T02D1203:259b-35: mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1203:259b-36: ra'i yig 'bru ni thabs kyi ngo bo'i gzugs ro
T02D1203:259b-37: ma'i mtshan nyid can mchog gi dga' ba srid pa'i
T02D1203:259b-39: tshul tsam ni phyogs gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'gegs pa'i phyir tsam mo ;
T02D1203:259b-40: /'o na yang ldan pa'i don gyis ni ye shes
T02D1203:259b-41: rgya che ba dang ye shes kyi phyogs kun dang
T02D1203:259b-42: ldan pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ste /
T02D1203:259b-43: 'dzin ma dang ro ma la sogs pa'i de rnams
T02D1203:259b-44: dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rtog med ma'i rang bzhin
T02D1203:260a-1: pa'i bde ba chen po dang ldan pa mchog tu
T02D1203:260a-2: gyur pa yang dbang po'i yul ma yin pa zhes
T02D1203:260a-3: bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis bstan to //
T02D1203:260a-5: de ni rab mchog aa yig 'bru //
T02D1203:260a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:260a-8: snying gi dbus na mi shes pa //
T02D1203:260a-9: gsal zhing mar mi bzhin du 'bar //
T02D1203:260a-10: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba ste //
T02D1203:260a-11: yig 'bru dam pa aar zhes bya //
T02D1203:260a-14: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa ste //
T02D1203:260a-15: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D1203:260a-16: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1203:260a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don gyis /
T02D1203:260a-18: rgyud kyi don la sogs pa bstan te //
T02D1203:260a-22: kun rdzob tsam du don sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1203:260a-23: tsam gyis skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi don
T02D1203:260a-24: rnyed do // dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel
T02D1203:260a-25: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u
T02D1203:260a-28: // / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das mo nyid kyi don zhu bar 'dod pa'i phyir na /
T02D1203:260a-30: bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags //
T02D1203:260a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:260a-32: zhus pa'i lan gsungs pa ni /
T02D1203:260a-33: ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba po ;
T02D1203:260a-34: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:260a-35: ye shes ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la
T02D1203:260a-36: sogs pa lnga pos de rnyed par 'gyur ba'i thab
T02D1203:260a-37: so // gsungs ba ni gnyis su med pa ye
T02D1203:260a-38: shes drug pa'i 'og byed pa'i rang bzhin nyid brjod
T02D1203:260a-40: snod ma yin pa rnams la mi bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02D1203:260a-44: 'od rab kyi ye shes kyis rnyed pa'o //
T02D1203:260a-45: snang ba'i rim pas dga' ba rnams kyi ngo bor bshad pa yin te /
T02D1203:260a-47: snang ba dga' bar bshad pa ste //
T02D1203:260a-48: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:260a-49: lha mo ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin te /
T02D1203:260a-50: rang bzhin gyi 'od rab de kho na nyid bde ba chen bo kun gyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1203:260a-52: gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni skye ba dang /
T02D1203:260a-54: bral ba brjod du med pa /
T02D1203:260b-0: yi ge dang bral ba dpyad pas @260b mi rnyed pa /
T02D1203:260b-2: chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1203:260b-4: skye ba nang gi 'pho med rab //
T02D1203:260b-5: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas ni /
T02D1203:260b-6: gang nas kyang ma skyes pa'i don to //
T02D1203:260b-7: da ni bcom ldan mo'i ngo bo bstan pa /
T02D1203:260b-8: rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'od //
T02D1203:260b-9: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:260b-10: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i yum nyid rang 'od kyi bdag nyid /
T02D1203:260b-11: phyag rgya chen po'i rang nyid ni bde ba chen
T02D1203:260b-12: po'i sku la sogs pa'i dbye bas dbye bar bya
T02D1203:260b-14: gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis rang gi ngo bo dbye ba'o //
T02D1203:260b-15: da ni skyon dang yon tan ston te /
T02D1203:260b-16: gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na //
T02D1203:260b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:260b-18: da ni 'byung ba dang skye ba med pa yin yang gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang dang /
T02D1203:260b-19: thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gshegs pa bstan te /
T02D1203:260b-20: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas byon //
T02D1203:260b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:260b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom
T02D1203:260b-23: ldan 'das yum phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa
T02D1203:260b-24: / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:260b-25: mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:260b-26: don gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las ma 'das par /
T02D1203:260b-27: gdul bya'i dbang gis sku bzhir snang ba dang /
T02D1203:260b-28: de bzhin du ji ltar 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so //
T02D1203:260b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje yis /
T02D1203:260b-31: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du snang //
T02D1203:260b-33: mchog ni bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid skyon gyis
T02D1203:260b-34: ma gos pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' sprin la
T02D1203:260b-35: sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T02D1203:260b-36: kun gyis bsgrub cing thob par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:260b-37: gnas de nyid las ma g-yos bzhin du don mdzad pas na byon pa'o //
T02D1203:260b-38: de yang gzugs kyi sku'i dngos po'i tshul du sa
T02D1203:260b-39: bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa bsam pa
T02D1203:260b-40: rnam par dag pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1203:260b-41: sku gnyis lta ba'i don spyod pa dang 'cham pa
T02D1203:260b-42: bzhin du byis pa so so skye bo la gzigs
T02D1203:260b-43: nas gdul bya'i dbang gis chos ston du gshegs kyang
T02D1203:261a-0: / sku nyid bde ba chen po las mi g-yos par @261a * //
T02D1203:261a-2: mchog ni nam mkha'i gnas nas gshegs //
T02D1203:261a-4: bde ba chen po'i sku thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1203:261a-6: phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba 'khor ba ji srid
T02D1203:261a-7: par gnas pa nyid la sogs pa'i bye brag dang
T02D1203:261a-8: ldan pas na / chos kyi sku dang ;
T02D1203:261a-9: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1203:261a-10: sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa kun gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1203:261a-11: sku de rnams tha mi dad pa mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1203:261a-12: de bas na mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal so nas /
T02D1203:261a-13: mchog gi nam mkha'i rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1203:261a-15: gzhan na re tshig bzhi po bde ba chen po'i
T02D1203:261a-16: 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhi la rim pa bzhin
T02D1203:261a-17: sbyar ro // da ni nges pa'i don du bshad de /
T02D1203:261a-18: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1203:261a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:261a-20: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le ni shuksha'i
T02D1203:261a-21: rnam pa bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor bzhugs pa'i
T02D1203:261a-22: gzugs so // yum phyag rgya chen mo mkha' 'gro
T02D1203:261a-23: ma'i gzugs kyi rnam par rtsa'i khyad par gyi dngos
T02D1203:261a-24: po rtog med ma'i sku ma nor ba thabs nyid
T02D1203:261a-27: de yang dbus kyi khyad par rtog med ma nyid g-yas dang g-yon du ro ma dang /
T02D1203:261a-28: 'dzin ma de dag gi gnas srog gi dbyug pa'o //
T02D1203:261a-29: gsang ba ni spa bar bya ba'i thabs kyi gsang
T02D1203:261a-30: ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig med pa la mi bstan
T02D1203:261a-31: pa ni / sangs rgyas rin po che ni snod
T02D1203:261a-32: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ge sar dang lte bar
T02D1203:261a-33: bcas pa'i snying po gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:261a-35: chad pa'i dga' ba'i gnas ma yin pa'i lte ba'i gnas khyad par can no //
T02D1203:261a-36: langs nas ni ye shes kyi 'od zer gzugs kyis bzhengs pa'i ngo bo 'di'o //
T02D1203:261a-37: bde ba'i padma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:261a-38: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i gnas rtog med
T02D1203:261a-39: ma'i lam gyi gnas kyi padma ni thabs dang shes
T02D1203:261a-40: rab gnyis dbyer med par bzhugs pa dang /
T02D1203:261a-41: gshegs pa dang byon pa'i gnas so //
T02D1203:261a-42: thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:261a-44: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i
T02D1203:261a-45: don gyis ye shes kyi 'od kyi thig le'i don
T02D1203:261a-46: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa'i gtum mo'i
T02D1203:261b-0: grogs lte ba'i thig @261b les byas pa dang /
T02D1203:261b-1: dbyer med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te /
T02D1203:261b-3: gshegs nas brten pa kun ka tshig / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1203:261b-4: gyen la gshegs shing 'od 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis
T02D1203:261b-5: rtsa'i nang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dngos po ji
T02D1203:261b-6: snyed pa de snyed ye shes kyi 'od kyis sbyangs
T02D1203:261b-7: shing bsregs / thal bar 'gyur pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1203:261b-8: de'i don ni mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin du byas pa la ni bsregs shing tshig ces bya'o //
T02D1203:261b-9: rgyal ba'i thig le khyer nas ni //
T02D1203:261b-11: sdig pa thams cad las rgyal ba ni /
T02D1203:261b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid /
T02D1203:261b-13: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bzhugs nas /
T02D1203:261b-14: spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du byed pa'i don to //
T02D1203:261b-15: yang ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:261b-16: sngar gyi lam nas yang sngon dang mi 'dra bar zhes bstan pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1203:261b-17: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen mo nyid de sngar bstan pa dang /
T02D1203:261b-19: da ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas dang 'brel pa'o //
T02D1203:261b-20: 'dir byon pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:261b-21: lte ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas nas gshegs nas
T02D1203:261b-22: yang slar sdud de de rang du byon zhes bya
T02D1203:261b-25: lte ba'i sprul pa'i padma zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D1203:261b-26: de nyid du gsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1203:261b-28: de yis ni spros pa med pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D1203:261b-29: po'i gtum mo ye shes kyi 'od la brten pa
T02D1203:261b-30: ste / dga' ba'i rim pas rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1203:261b-31: de nyid las spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin dga'
T02D1203:261b-32: ba phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin rnyed pa'o ;
T02D1203:261b-33: / kha cig 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas spros pa dang bcas par 'dod /
T02D1203:261b-34: kha cig spros pa yod rung med rung /
T02D1203:261b-35: mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas nas byon pa la sogs
T02D1203:261b-36: pa'i tshigs bcad 'dir rang bzhin dga' ba'i gnas gnyis
T02D1203:261b-37: la sbyar te / de yang bde chen gyi gnas dang /
T02D1203:261b-38: sprul pa ru rang bzhin dga' ba skye ba'i dus kyi skabs kyi gnas so zhes zer ro //
T02D1203:261b-39: kha cig sprul pa'i gnas kho na zhes smra'o //
T02D1203:261b-40: de bzhin kha cig bde ba chen po gcig pur
T02D1203:261b-41: gnas pa dang gshegs pa la sogs pa zer ro
T02D1203:261b-42: // tshangs pa'i yul las bye ba mthar //
T02D1203:262a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang chub @262a * //
T02D1203:262a-1: kyi sems bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi spyi bo'i 'khor lo na gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1203:262a-2: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin can
T02D1203:262a-3: yin pas phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das yum
T02D1203:262a-4: dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du gcig pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1203:262a-5: rgyas btab pa'i nges pa'i tshig gsungs pa ni /
T02D1203:262a-6: de'i phyir phyag rgya chen po khyod grags zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:262a-8: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
T02D1203:262a-9: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
T02D1203:262a-11: sems ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
T02D1203:262a-12: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
T02D1203:262a-15: 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang //
T02D1203:262a-16: gzhan nas sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1203:262a-17: sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1203:262a-18: gzhan na sangs rgyas bstan du med //
T02D1203:262a-20: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:262a-21: kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gcig
T02D1203:262a-23: / sngags kyi don la som nyer gyur pas 'dir zhugs pa ni /
T02D1203:262a-24: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa //
T02D1203:262a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rjes dang
T02D1203:262a-26: padma'i sgras bshad pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi padma
T02D1203:262a-27: 'dab ma dang / lte bar bcas pa'i gsang ba'i
T02D1203:262a-28: thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'byed par byed
T02D1203:262a-29: cing rgyas par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:262a-30: gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas byed pa'o //
T02D1203:262a-31: ji lta ba'i nyi ma shar ba'i byin gyi rlabs
T02D1203:262a-32: kyis padma'i gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel
T02D1203:262a-33: pa'i dpe brjod pa'i don kyang de bzhin no //
T02D1203:262a-34: re zhig ni rim gyis pa'i don yin te /
T02D1203:262a-35: 'og nas 'byung ba dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1203:262a-36: ci'i phyir gsang ba bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:262a-37: der gnas dang gsang pa'i don bshad pa /
T02D1203:262a-38: 'dir gsang ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid rgyas pa dang gnas kyi don zhus pa'o //
T02D1203:262a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:262a-40: 'pho ba dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ri bong can gyi gzugs ni /
T02D1203:262a-41: ga pur dngos po phur dang bral //
T02D1203:262a-43: shes rab kyi skye gnas kyi khyad par de bzhin
T02D1203:262a-44: thabs la yang yin pa'i rang bzhin gnas ni skye
T02D1203:262b-0: de dag la @262b brten pa byams pas dga' ba
T02D1203:262b-1: la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don 'byung ba bcom ldan
T02D1203:262b-3: dga' pa sbyin pa mo phyag rgya //
T02D1203:262b-5: de la gsang ba'i don ni rgyu'i rang bzhin 'bras
T02D1203:262b-6: bu dang bcas pa gsum gyi dbye bas rab 'bring
T02D1203:262b-7: dang / tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no ;
T02D1203:262b-8: / bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang 'bras bu dang /
T02D1203:262b-9: thabs dang gsum gyi dbye bas rab dang /
T02D1203:262b-11: tha ma'i don bstan pa yin no //
T02D1203:262b-12: bcom ldan mo yum gyis tha mal pa'i 'dod chags dang /
T02D1203:262b-15: byang chub sems ni ga pur gzugs //
T02D1203:262b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:262b-17: kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems gang zag so so'i skye bo thams cad la yod pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1203:262b-18: pho dang mo'i skye gnas kyis phye nas /
T02D1203:262b-19: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa kun byed cing gnas kyang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:262b-20: gang zag kun gyi gsang ba'i don nges pa kho
T02D1203:262b-21: nar shes shing khong du chud pa'i don gyis dbang
T02D1203:262b-22: bskur ba'i don dang dam tshig dang /
T02D1203:262b-23: thos pa la sogs pa mi dgos par 'gyur bas na ci zhig bya zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:262b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa lon kyang ni /
T02D1203:262b-25: ma rangs pa'i tshig tu rig par bya'o //
T02D1203:262b-26: drang pa'i don gyi tshig gis ldan //
T02D1203:262b-28: byang chub kyi sems ga pur kun rdzob kyi dngos
T02D1203:262b-29: po'i gzugs la yang yon tan yod pa yin pa
T02D1203:262b-30: dang / de bzhin du gnas la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1203:262b-31: rten gyi don gyi phyir yang dag nges pa'i don zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:262b-32: rten kun rdzob kyi gzugs gnas dang /
T02D1203:262b-33: byang chub kyi sems ga pur drang ba'i don gyi tshig la brten nas /
T02D1203:262b-34: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin nges pa'i don yang dag pa'i tshig dang /
T02D1203:262b-35: rten la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa /
T02D1203:262b-36: rten dang rten las rnyed pa de ni /
T02D1203:262b-37: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1203:262b-38: de'i phyir rten med na 'bras bu ji ltar rnyed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:262b-39: lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems //
T02D1203:263a-0: dper na lus med par sems gnas pa'i gzhi med pa @263a * //
T02D1203:263a-1: bzhin khu ba'i gzugs med na bde ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1203:263a-2: med pa ni bde ba kho na nyid yin no
T02D1203:263a-4: lus kyi dngos med ci ste bde //
T02D1203:263a-5: bde ba brjod par yong mi nus //
T02D1203:263a-6: khyab bya khyab byed rang bzhin du //
T02D1203:263a-7: 'gro ba rnams la bde bas khyab //
T02D1203:263a-8: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri /
T02D1203:263a-9: me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur /
T02D1203:263a-10: de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med na //
T02D1203:263a-11: bde ba dmigs su med pa nyid //
T02D1203:263a-14: khu ba med na bde med 'gyur //
T02D1203:263a-15: bde dang bral na'ang de med 'gyur //
T02D1203:263a-16: ltos bcas nus pa med pa'i phyir //
T02D1203:263a-17: lha yi sbyor bas bde ba'o //
T02D1203:263a-19: ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang //
T02D1203:263a-21: lus dang me tog la sogs pa'i bde ba dpe bstan pa rnams dang /
T02D1203:263a-22: de bzhin 'dir mthun par bshad pa'i tshig dang 'brel par don mthun pa 'di ni /
T02D1203:263a-23: rten gyi rgyu'i gsang ba'o / da ni 'bras bu'i gsang ba'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02D1203:263a-24: drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min //
T02D1203:263a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:263a-26: da ni thabs dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i don btsal bar bstan te /
T02D1203:263a-27: yang na mos pa 'bring gi don gyis su //
T02D1203:263a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:263a-29: mchog gi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni dga' ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni /
T02D1203:263a-30: rang bzhin dga' ba'i ngo bo bzhi pa 'di yin no //
T02D1203:263a-31: sbyin pa ni chad pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid
T02D1203:263a-32: kyis bzhi pa'i 'bras bu gzugs su ster ba'i don
T02D1203:263a-34: 'bad pas chad dga' srung bar byed //
T02D1203:263a-35: ces bya ba la sogs pa la chad pa'i dga'
T02D1203:263a-36: ba'i gnas su shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyor ba
T02D1203:263a-37: byas pa las / byang chub sems babs pa de
T02D1203:263a-38: rdo rje'i 'khor lor mchog gi dga' bde las 'phos
T02D1203:263a-40: ye shes kyi rlung 'gugs pa'i srung bar byed pa'o //
T02D1203:263a-41: de nyid las rang bzhin dga' ba nyams su myong ba rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1203:263a-42: de'i 'bras bu ni gsang ba'i don te /
T02D1203:263a-43: bzhi pa'i rdo rje'i sku zag pa med pa bde ba dus thams cad par rgya che ba /
T02D1203:263a-44: spros pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes te /
T02D1203:263a-45: rab kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba 'bras bu'i don to //
T02D1203:263b-0: gzhan na re chad pa'i dga' @263b ba nas rang bzhin dga' bar 'og tu 'pho ba ste /
T02D1203:263b-1: de yang gong ma'i yon tan gyis 'og ma thub
T02D1203:263b-2: pa de las 'bras bu'i don rnyed kyi skye ba
T02D1203:263b-3: ma yin no zhes zer ro //
T02D1203:263b-4: nor mdud snying ga yi ni gsang //
T02D1203:263b-6: rin po che'i nor bu'i mdud pa'i dkyil gyi lte
T02D1203:263b-7: ba'i snying ga'i gnas ni gsang ba'i gzhi dang bcas
T02D1203:263b-9: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:263b-10: gnas khyad par can du kun rdzob dang don dam
T02D1203:263b-11: pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang rang bzhin dga' ba
T02D1203:263b-12: dang ldan par bzhugs pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1203:263b-13: thabs kyi gzugs la gnas kyi bye brag dang /
T02D1203:263b-14: byang chub sems kyi rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin shes rab ma la yang gnas pa ni /
T02D1203:263b-15: shes rab ma yi de bzhin no //
T02D1203:263b-17: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:263b-18: kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gnyis
T02D1203:263b-20: / gsang ba'i don rang bzhin dga' ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1203:263b-21: du gsungs pa'i rjes su bar cis kyang mchod pa
T02D1203:263b-22: / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen
T02D1203:263b-23: po yang zhu bar byed do zhes bya ba ni
T02D1203:263b-24: / / sngar zhus pa de yin pa'i don la yang zhu zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1203:263b-25: mgon po thams cad gtan la phab //
T02D1203:263b-26: ji ltar rang bzhin yin pa las /
T02D1203:263b-28: skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs mgon byed pa khyod yin zhes pos nas /
T02D1203:263b-29: rgyud kyi rim pa 'di nyid kyi phyi dang nang
