T02D1203:263b-30: la sogs pa'i chos rnams thams cad gsungs shing bshad
T02D1203:263b-32: de rnams thams cad kyi gsang ba'i don rang bzhin dga' ba mchog tu gyur pa ;
T02D1203:263b-34: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po gnyis su
T02D1203:263b-35: med pa'i ye shes de ji lta bu lags zhes
T02D1203:263b-37: de ji lta bu'i tshig thos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:263b-38: zhus pa'i tshig la lan bka' ma stsal par cad
T02D1203:263b-39: mi gsung bar mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1203:263b-40: mi snang ba'i ngo bo bde ba chen po gnyis
T02D1203:263b-41: su med pa'i don la bzhugs pa tsam gyis gzhan
T02D1203:263b-42: gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'i don to //
T02D1203:263b-43: 'di'i don ni 'di rang gi 'og nas rgyas par gsungs te /
T02D1203:263b-45: rang bzhin brjod du med pa dang /
T02D1203:264a-1: du med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:264a-2: 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems
T02D1203:264a-3: dpa' sems dpa' chen po litstsha b'a dri ma med
T02D1203:264a-4: par grags pa la gnyis su med pa'i don slar
T02D1203:264a-5: dris pas / dri ma med par grags pa cang mi gsung pa'i tshul dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T02D1203:264a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen po
T02D1203:264a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa rnams ni
T02D1203:264a-8: go sla'o // 'di'i rgyud las bdag las gzhan zhes
T02D1203:264a-9: bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ye
T02D1203:264a-10: shes thig le'i rgyud 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang
T02D1203:264a-11: bzhin gyi don dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1203:264a-12: gyi don gyi mtshan brdar bstan pa tha dad pa
T02D1203:264a-13: ru yod pa ni ma yin te gcig pa nyid
T02D1203:264a-14: go sla'o // do // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1203:264a-15: dpa' bo rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos bcom
T02D1203:264a-16: ldan 'das nyid las 'di'i chos thams cad rdzu 'phrul
T02D1203:264a-17: gyi cho 'phrul gyis bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1203:264a-18: de ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i pad //
T02D1203:264a-19: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra'i dbyi gzhug gis sngon bzhin no //
T02D1203:264a-20: na ma'i don gyis shes rab kyi padma dang /
T02D1203:264a-21: thabs kyi nor bu rin po che'i sgras chad pa'i
T02D1203:264a-22: dga' ba dang mchog gi dga' ba'i rgyu de dag
T02D1203:264a-23: sbyor ba las rang bzhin dga' ba'i rgyal po nyid
T02D1203:264a-24: ni / bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i mtshan nyid kyi don dang /
T02D1203:264a-25: dpa' bo rnams kyi yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1203:264a-26: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i 'bras bu'i
T02D1203:264a-27: don dang rang bzhin dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1203:264a-28: don du bsdus pa 'di yin no //
T02D1203:264a-29: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:264a-30: kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu gsum
T02D1203:264a-32: / bcom ldan 'das mos gsol pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:264a-35: shes rab ye shes la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su /
T02D1203:264a-37: rdo rje slob dpon bla mas cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing /
T02D1203:264a-38: slob mas tshul ji ltar zhu zhing blang zhes zhus pa'o //
T02D1203:264a-39: chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su //
T02D1203:264b-0: rdo rje @264b dang dril bu dang /
T02D1203:264b-1: ming la sogs pa'i dbang bcu gcig po rnams bskur ba'i dus su /
T02D1203:264b-3: rdul tshon la sogs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:264b-4: sogs pa'i sgras thang ka'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1203:264b-6: lugs ma bshad par shes so //
T02D1203:264b-7: gsang ba'i dbang bskur dus su ni //
T02D1203:264b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:264b-13: de bzhin du me tog gi khyad par gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa /
T02D1203:264b-14: gsang ba'i dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1203:264b-17: ku mu da yis mtshon nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya /
T02D1203:264b-18: dgram par bya zhing gzor bya'o //
T02D1203:264b-20: de bzhin du rdul tshon la sogs pa'i yang bshad pa'o //
T02D1203:264b-21: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur dus su zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:264b-26: aa ka ru la sogs pa dri zhim po sna
T02D1203:264b-27: tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la dbang bskur sbyin par
T02D1203:264b-28: bya'o // yang na gur kum dang /
T02D1203:264b-29: ga pur gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya zhes nang du bstan pa'o //
T02D1203:264b-30: da ni dbang bskur ba'i mtshan nyid ston te /
T02D1203:264b-31: las dang po'i dang po la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:264b-32: sbyang ba ma byas pa'i sems can rnams la /
T02D1203:264b-41: skyabs sbyin de rnams nges pa'i don du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1203:264b-42: shes rab can drang ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:264b-43: sbyang byas pa'i shes rab ldan pa la drang ba'i don du de rnams sbyin pa'o //
T02D1203:264b-45: dbang po rab kyi yang rab yin pa'i phyir na /
T02D1203:264b-46: bsod nams chen pos yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid can /
T02D1203:264b-47: ji ltar padma yongs su smin pa las nyi ma'i
T02D1203:264b-48: 'od kyis reg gang tsam gyis rgyas par gyur pa'o
T02D1203:264b-49: // padma yongs su ma smin pa rnams ni /
T02D1203:264b-51: 'on kyang dus phyis rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1203:264b-52: de bas na sa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob cing sbyang ba byas pa'i don te /
T02D1203:264b-53: mchog gi bla ma dang 'dzom pa'o //
T02D1203:265a-1: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bstan te /
T02D1203:265a-2: nor bu'i mgrin par byang chub sems //
T02D1203:265a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:265a-4: slob ma'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su ye shes bskyed pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1203:265a-5: rke yi dbus su rtsa gnyis ni //
T02D1203:265a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1203:265a-7: mthe bo mtha' ltag gnyis kyis man na //
T02D1203:265a-9: thabs dang shes rab kyi rdo rje dang padma'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsams te /
T02D1203:265a-10: rtsa btsir ba la rtog pa med pa'i ye shes skye ba 'di ni /
T02D1203:265a-11: gsang ba'i dbang gi don yin te /
T02D1203:265a-14: de'i dpe yi rang bzhin ni /
T02D1203:265a-15: bu mos rnyed pa'i bde ji bzhin //
T02D1203:265a-17: skyes pa dang phrad pa'i bu mo gzhon nu ma'i
T02D1203:265a-18: bde bde gzhan dag las bstan brjod par mi nus
T02D1203:265a-19: pa ji ltar ba bzhin du /
T02D1203:265a-20: rtsa mnan pa'i ye shes kyang don de ltar ro //
T02D1203:265a-21: gzhan kha cig ni ma ning la sogs pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i thabs dang /
T02D1203:265a-22: ye shes su bcas pa yin no zer ro //
T02D1203:265a-24: ji ltar gzhon pa'i chags dag dang //
T02D1203:265a-25: ji ltar lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin //
T02D1203:265a-28: rke yi dbus su rtsa gnyis ni //
T02D1203:265a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1203:265a-30: rgad po dang skyes pa shes rab ye shes kyi
T02D1203:265a-31: dbang bskur ba'i ye shes la bral ba'i dga' ba
T02D1203:265a-33: dul ba'i mthe bong dang mtha' ltag gi rtsol ba las skye ba'i don to zhes zer ro //
T02D1203:265a-34: da ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ston te /
T02D1203:265a-35: reg bya chen pos dga' ba che //
T02D1203:265a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:265a-37: rdo rje slob dpon gyis gzhon nu ma la /
T02D1203:265a-38: rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba las nang gi reg
T02D1203:265a-39: bya chen po'i mtshan nyid dga' ba'i don nyams su
T02D1203:265a-40: myong ba dang / de las mchog gi dga' ba
T02D1203:265a-41: la sogs pa'i bde ba bdag dang shes rab man
T02D1203:265a-42: gyis kas myong ba'i don rang bzhin dga' ba rdzogs
T02D1203:265a-43: pa'i rim pas dbang rdzogs par bskur bas shes rab
T02D1203:265a-44: kyi dad pa skyed pa dang /
T02D1203:265a-45: yang slob ma de lta bu'i don bstan cing /
T02D1203:265b-0: @265b skad cig ma rnams kyi don bstan cing don du yang gzhug pa ni /
T02D1203:265b-1: dga' sogs bye brag mgu bar bya //
T02D1203:265b-4: rtsa ba nas gsal ba'i don gyis so //
T02D1203:265b-5: da ni slob ma dbang bskur zhing skyabs sbyin gyi cho ga gzhan du ston te /
T02D1203:265b-6: de nas slob ma la sbyin bya //
T02D1203:265b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:265b-8: dbang bskur ba'i rim pa de rnams ni las dang po pa rnams la sbyin no //
T02D1203:265b-9: shes rab can gyi slob ma la ni /
T02D1203:265b-10: bya ba dang bral ba'i dbang sbyin pa yin te /
T02D1203:265b-11: nang la sogs pa bum pa dang /
T02D1203:265b-12: gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa rnams so //
T02D1203:265b-13: 'on kyang rgyud las ni 'di skad du /
T02D1203:265b-14: dang po'i dga' ba dang ldan pa //
T02D1203:265b-15: sras dang po la sbyin par bya //
T02D1203:265b-16: gnyis pa dga' ba dang ldan pa //
T02D1203:265b-17: snang ba gsum ni thabs la sbyin //
T02D1203:265b-18: gsum pa dga' ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1203:265b-19: chos kyi sprin rnyed nges pas so //
T02D1203:265b-20: bzhi pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa'i //
T02D1203:265b-21: kun du 'od rnyed sa la sbyin //
T02D1203:265b-23: bla ma'i zhal snga nas las dang po ba de gnyis ni gcig la ma yin te /
T02D1203:265b-25: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po pa dang /
T02D1203:265b-26: slob bzhin pa'i khyad par gyi phyir ni rgyu gnyis su ming tsam mthun yang ;
T02D1203:265b-27: don ni de lta ma yin no //
T02D1203:265b-28: dper na lha'i bu tshangs pa dang /
T02D1203:265b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs pa bzhin no zhes gsungs so //
T02D1203:265b-30: mtha' ni rnam par 'byed par shes //
T02D1203:265b-32: chad pa'i dga' ba'i pho brang ye shes bco lnga'i rnam pa 'byed pa ni /
T02D1203:265b-33: rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes la rten dang bcas pa'i dngos po rnams kyi bye brag go //
T02D1203:265b-34: bcom pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:265b-35: de rnams kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma ji snyed bcom pa'i phyir ni /
T02D1203:265b-36: rang bzhin dga' ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1203:265b-37: de'i rten gyi khyad par dang /
T02D1203:265b-38: bskyed pa'i rim par rdzogs pa'i ye shes chen po mthong bzhin rnyed par 'gyur bar bshad pa'o //
T02D1203:265b-39: de'i phyir na rnam par 'byed pa bcom mthar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:265b-41: ye shes chen po sku dang bral //
T02D1203:265b-42: gnyis su med par nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1203:266a-2: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:266a-3: kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu bzhi
T02D1203:266a-5: / mngon sum zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:266a-6: nyid kyis mngon sum du nyams su myong nas /
T02D1203:266a-7: gzhan la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i don bstan pa'am ;
T02D1203:266a-8: rjes su dpag pa ni nyams su myong bar dgongs
T02D1203:266a-9: pa'i dbang gis gzhan dag la rtags kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1203:266a-10: la brten nas gsungs pa yin pa'am /
T02D1203:266a-11: rgyu dang 'bras bu mthun pa ma yin na ni /
T02D1203:266a-13: dper na 'bras kyi sa bon las 'bras 'byung ba ni rigs pa yin pa dang /
T02D1203:266a-14: sa bon las 'bras bu s'a lu skye ba ni mi rigs pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:266a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
T02D1203:266a-17: gsang sna padma'i snying po ni //
T02D1203:266a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:266a-19: thabs rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po
T02D1203:266a-20: che'i rtse mor rang gi gnas na chu skyes padma
T02D1203:266a-21: brgyad pa'i 'og na gsum pa lte ba dang bcas
T02D1203:266a-22: pa'i snying po ni tshig rgyas pa'i gnas yin te
T02D1203:266a-23: / phyag rgya rnams las gang yang rung ba gcig gis sbyor ba byas pa las /
T02D1203:266a-24: ye shes kyi me 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1203:266a-25: yang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje bde ba byang chub
T02D1203:266a-26: kyi sems slar rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rang
T02D1203:266a-27: bzhin dga' ba'i gnas su gshegs pa nyid kyis rgyas
T02D1203:266a-28: pa'i don ni rim gyis ye shes snying po'i bdag
T02D1203:266a-29: nyid rgyal po'o // yang na thams cad kyi ni tshig / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1203:266a-30: snying po ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis spangs
T02D1203:266a-31: pa'i byang chub kyi sems gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1203:266a-32: shes te / dbyer mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1203:266a-33: rdo rje bya gdong ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang
T02D1203:266a-34: phyug ma'i rtsa dbyibs kha khva mu kha'i rtsa dbyibs
T02D1203:266a-35: ni shes rab ma'i dbang du byas te /
T02D1203:266a-36: 'dab ma dang lte ba la sogs pa ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D1203:266a-37: de la rdo rje rtse mo yis //
T02D1203:266a-39: thabs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D1203:266a-40: sangs rgyas rin po che gnyis kha sprad pa las
T02D1203:266a-41: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs kyi bdag
T02D1203:266a-42: nyid la rgyu byed pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1203:266a-43: phye ba de ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02D1203:266b-0: rdo rje dang @266b padma'i don gyis snying po bde
T02D1203:266b-1: ba chen po'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bya gdong
T02D1203:266b-2: ma khong du chud pa ni /
T02D1203:266b-4: ae ta bi gal gnyis kyi dbus //
T02D1203:266b-6: g-yas pa ni g-yon pa'i rtsa gzung 'dzin gyi dngos
T02D1203:266b-7: po dang bcas pas rtog pa can gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1203:266b-8: dang gcig pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dbus na
T02D1203:266b-10: gnyis pa'i bdag nyid bde ba dang bcas pa'i phyir rtog med ma'o //
T02D1203:266b-11: so sho ma ye shes ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02D1203:266b-12: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i gzugs kyi zhu ba
T02D1203:266b-13: med pa shin tu phra ba'i ye shes rgyun mi
T02D1203:266b-15: gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i rtsa nyid kyi ming gi rnam
T02D1203:266b-16: grangs ni mtshan nyid spangs pa'i gzugs su gnas zhes
T02D1203:266b-17: bya'o // thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes don rtogs par bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1203:266b-18: bsgrub dang bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1203:266b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1203:266b-20: las kyi phyag rgya la ltos pa med par tshig rgyas pa'i snying po'i don bshad pa ni /
T02D1203:266b-21: lte ba'i dbus nas smin 'khor lo //
T02D1203:266b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:266b-23: kha cig na re las kyi phyag rgya'i bsgrub pa dang bsrub pa'i rgyus /
T02D1203:266b-24: lte ba'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo //
T02D1203:266b-25: la sogs pa yin par 'gyur ba'o zhes zer ro //
T02D1203:266b-26: da ni rang bzhin dga' ba bde ba chen po'i
T02D1203:266b-27: rgyal po'i don bshad tshig rgyas pa'i zhes bya ba'i
T02D1203:266b-29: ma ni bsrub dang bsrub pa ste //
T02D1203:266b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras gsungs pa'i don ni /
T02D1203:266b-31: le'u bcu bzhi pa'i sgra'i dbyi gzhug bstan pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1203:266b-32: bsrub pa dang bsrub pa ni thabs dang shes rab
T02D1203:266b-33: la brten pa'i don ston pa ni dga' ba la
T02D1203:266b-34: sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i don ni go sla bas ma
T02D1203:266b-35: bshad do // dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel
T02D1203:266b-36: gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u
T02D1203:266b-37: nyi shu lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1203:266b-39: // / de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don ston pa'i le'u 'byung ba la ni /
T02D1203:266b-40: de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad //
T02D1203:266b-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po la bos nas
T02D1203:266b-43: 'di'i zab mo'i don nyid du bsdus te gsungs pa'o
T02D1203:267a-2: rgyud 'di dbu nas zhabs su gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rgyu la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:267a-3: 'di rnams ni rgyud kyi don gyi snying po bsdus pa yin pas /
T02D1203:267a-4: phyi ma la sogs pa ni 'di dang rang rang gi le'u'i skabs su gsal la /
T02D1203:267a-5: de kho na nyid kyi skabs 'di ni ;
T02D1203:267a-6: dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs pas der blta bar bya zhing /
T02D1203:267a-7: shes par bya ba yin no //
T02D1203:267a-9: 'dir mangs pas 'jigs pa dang 'pho ba dang 'byung ba'i chos can gyi phyir na /
T02D1203:267a-10: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di'i don der zhib tu bshad pa'i don gyis ma bris pa yin no //
T02D1203:267a-11: 'on kyang 'dir dga' ba'i don ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1203:267a-12: de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha' //
T02D1203:267a-14: bde ba chen po'i ye shes rang bzhin dga' ba'i mnga' bdag spros pa dang bral ba'i don la /
T02D1203:267a-15: de kho na nyid bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid bde ba
T02D1203:267a-16: chen po'i rgyal po bdud rtsi'i gter la yang dag
T02D1203:267a-19: de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don //
T02D1203:267a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:267a-21: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
T02D1203:267a-23: de kho na nyid gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas zhugs shing /
T02D1203:267a-24: bsgom pa la 'bad pa'i stobs kyis rang bzhin gyi
T02D1203:267a-25: ye shes bde ba chen po nyid thob par 'gyur
T02D1203:267a-26: ba dang / de bzhin du bzhi ba cus kyang de nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1203:267a-27: yang gcig kyang kun gyi bdag nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1203:267a-28: kun kyang de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba khod du chud par bya ba yin no //
T02D1203:267a-29: 'dir spyod pa drug bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig ler gsungs pas /
T02D1203:267a-30: de rang bzhin bcu po spyir bzhag pa'i don bstan pa ni /
T02D1203:267a-31: cha yi ye shes tshor byed do //
T02D1203:267a-33: sbyor ba rnams de kho na nyid rnams ni thabs
T02D1203:267a-34: dang thabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D1203:267a-35: gyis bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'i de
T02D1203:267a-36: kho na nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1203:267a-37: ro zhes so // 'di ni 'bras bu'i don yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1203:267a-38: rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:267a-39: gzhan du sa'i rim pa dang sbyar nas yang 'dir bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1203:267b-0: dpal ye @267b shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i
T02D1203:267b-1: de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu
T02D1203:267b-4: // / bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' la //
T02D1203:267b-5: kun dga' ba yi rnam pa'i sku //
T02D1203:267b-7: dga' ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid mchog gi dga' ba /
T02D1203:267b-8: rab las rab mchog tu 'gyur ba'i dga' ba de nyid ni /

T02D1203:271a-3: shes de nyid dam pa 'di ni kun gyis thob
T02D1203:271a-4: par bya bar 'os pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir mchog go
T02D1203:271a-7: thob ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam grangs su gsungs so //
T02D1203:271a-8: de bas na bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1203:271a-9: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1203:271a-10: de bzhin du sbyar zhing rgya cher bshad do //
T02D1203:271a-11: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel gsang ba'i de
T02D1203:271a-12: kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u nyi shu dgu
T02D1203:271a-14: / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang
T02D1203:271a-15: bcas pa'i bcom ldan ma bos te zhes bya ba
T02D1203:271a-16: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du yang dag pa'i
T02D1203:271a-17: don nges par ston pa'i rgyud 'di nan tan dang
T02D1203:271a-18: bcas nas gtang ba'i cho ga gsungs pas shes rab
T02D1203:271a-19: kyi pha rol tu phyi na ma zhes bya'o //
T02D1203:271a-20: sbyor ba drug gi grags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1203:271a-21: dpal mchog gi bla ma'i zhal nas 'bad pas btsal te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1203:271a-22: dpal aindra bh'u ti rgyal po chen po las bar ma chad pa'i man ngag thob pa dang /
T02D1203:271a-23: dbang bskur ba yin zhing grub pa brnyes pa dang ldan na /
T02D1203:271a-24: sbyor ba drug la sogs pa'i rgyud shes pas de lta bu la blangs la /
T02D1203:271a-25: dam tshig dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1203:271a-26: de yang 'di skad du bsam gtan la sogs pa'i
T02D1203:271a-27: sa yang dag par thob par bya zhes gtan la
T02D1203:271a-29: de bzhin du thabs kyi rgyud 'di yang nan tan du bya ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02D1203:271a-31: rim gro la sogs pa dang /
T02D1203:271a-32: chu dang me la sogs pa dang /
T02D1203:271a-33: chu dmigs na par sba ba dang /
T02D1203:271a-35: bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don gyis bshad pa yin no //
T02D1203:271a-36: yang de bzhin du phyi rabs rnams kyis kyang /
T02D1203:271a-37: bsam gtan la sogs pas nyams su blangs zhing tha
T02D1203:271a-38: na skad cig tsam yang mnyam par gzhag pas bde
T02D1203:271a-40: bsgoms shing bsgrubs pas 'bras bu thob pa ni /
T02D1203:271a-42: gzhan du na log par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1203:271b-0: dpal ye shes thig le'i dka' 'grel @271b gsang ba'i
T02D1203:271b-1: de kho na nyid ces bya ba le'u sum cu
T02D1203:271b-3: / gang tshe yang dag mchog gi lus la ma brten par /
T02D1203:271b-4: de tsam thos dang sgra sogs chos ni ji snyed kun //
T02D1203:271b-5: rgyud kyi don ni ji bzhin shes par nus ma yin //
T02D1203:271b-6: de bas bdag gis dka' 'grel 'di ni byas pa'o //
T02D1203:271b-7: ji ltar rdo rjes phug pa'i nor bu ni //
T02D1203:271b-8: srad bus rjes su 'jug cing bde bas bstar //
T02D1203:271b-9: dam pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i man ngag la //
T02D1203:271b-10: bdag kyang de bzhin 'dir ni brten pa'o //
T02D1203:271b-11: rtsod dang bag med gyur pa yis //
T02D1203:271b-13: 'phags pas rang gi sras bzhin du ;
T02D1203:271b-14: / de dag thams cad bzod par gsol //
T02D1203:271b-15: gang du bdag gis ma shes pa //
T02D1203:271b-16: der ni bdag la yod min na //
T02D1203:271b-17: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas sogs rnams //
T02D1203:271b-18: kun gyis bzod par de la mdzod //
T02D1203:271b-19: rgyal po aindra bh'u ti yi //
T02D1203:271b-21: dam tshig sdom pa bsrung ba dang //
T02D1203:271b-22: bla ma la gus bsgom la brtson //
T02D1203:271b-23: shes rab rnam gsum dang ldan pas //
T02D1203:271b-25: man ngag 'di la rim ji ltar //
T02D1203:271b-26: grub thob pa ni bde bar nges //
T02D1203:271b-27: de bas gzhung ni ma nor bar //
T02D1203:271b-28: dam pa'i dpal ldan bla ma la //
T02D1203:271b-29: 'bad pas btsal nas rang nyid bsgrub //
T02D1203:271b-31: de lta min te log pa ni //
T02D1203:271b-32: sdug bsngal myong nas lhung ba yin //
T02D1203:271b-33: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' yin kyang ni 'grel sogs bral //
T02D1203:271b-34: don ni byis pas ma nor shes par nus pa yin //
T02D1203:271b-35: de bas 'di byas pa yi dge ba'i bsod nams kyis //
T02D1203:271b-36: 'gro ba ma lus rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob
T02D1203:271b-37: shog / dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi dka'
T02D1203:271b-38: 'grel gsang ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba
T02D1203:271b-39: slob dpon a'a ts'a rya dzny'a na bar ma yis
T02D1203:271b-42: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong byang chub 'byung gnas kyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1203:271b-43: rgyud rgyal ye shes thig le la //
T02D1203:271b-44: aindra bh'u ti'i man ngag gis //
T02D1203:271b-45: rim gyis brgyud nas legs par bshad //
